title: Chief Executives
description: Determine and formulate policies and provide overall direction of companies or private and public sector organizations within guidelines set up by a board of directors or similar governing body. Plan, direct, or coordinate operational activities at the highest level of management with the help of subordinate executives and staff managers.
description_nb: Fastsetter og utformer retningslinjer og sørger for samlet styring av selskaper eller virksomheter i privat eller offentlig sektor innen rammer satt av et bedriftsstyre eller tilsvarende styringsorgan. Planlegger, styrer eller samordner driften på øverste ledelsesnivå ved hjelp av mellomledere og stabssjefer.

title: Chief Sustainability Officers
description: Communicate and coordinate with management, shareholders, customers, and employees to address sustainability issues. Enact or oversee a corporate sustainability strategy.
description_nb: Kommuniserer og samordner med ledelse, aksjonærer, kunder og ansatte for å ta tak i bærekraftsrelaterte spørsmål. Vedtar eller fører tilsyn med en bedrifts bærekraftstrategi.

title: General and Operations Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the operations of public or private sector organizations. Duties and responsibilities include formulating policies, managing daily operations, and planning the use of materials and human resources, but are too diverse and general in nature to be classified in any one functional area of management or administration, such as personnel, purchasing, or administrative services.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner driften i organisasjoner i privat eller offentlig sektor. Plikter og ansvar inkluderer å utformer retningslinjer, sørge for daglig drift og planlegge bruken av materielle og menneskelige ressurser, men disse er for varierte og generelle til å kunne klassifiseres i noe bestemt område av ledelsen eller administrasjonen, som f.eks. HR, innkjøp eller servicetjenester.

title: Legislators
description: Develop, introduce or enact laws and statutes at the local, tribal, State, or Federal level. Includes only workers in elected positions.
description_nb: Utvikler, innfører eller vedtar lover og vedtekter lokalt, kommunalt, fylkeskommunalt eller nasjonalt nivå. Omfatter bare arbeidere i folkevalgte stillinger.

title: Advertising and Promotions Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate advertising policies and programs or produce collateral materials, such as posters, contests, coupons, or give-aways, to create extra interest in the purchase of a product or service for a department, an entire organization, or on an account basis.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner markedsføringsstrategier og -prosjekter eller lager profileringsmateriale som f.eks. plakater, konkurranser, rabattkuponger eller vareprøver for å skape mer interesse for kjøp av produkter eller tjenester for en avdeling, et helt selskap eller på kundenivå.

title: Marketing Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate marketing policies and programs, such as determining the demand for products and services offered by a firm and its competitors, and identify potential customers. Develop pricing strategies with the goal of maximizing the firm's profits or share of the market while ensuring the firm's customers are satisfied. Oversee product development or monitor trends that indicate the need for new products and services.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner markedsføringsstrategier og -prosjekter, som f.eks. å beregne etterspørsel etter varer og tjenester som er tilbudt av et selskap og dets konkurrenter, og identifisere potensielle kunder. Utvikler strategier for prissetting med mål om å maksimere firmaets profitt eller markedsandel og sikrer samtidig at firmaets kunder er fornøyde. Fører oppsyn med produktutvikling eller følger med på trender som viser behov for nye produkter og tjenester.

title: Sales Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the actual distribution or movement of a product or service to the customer. Coordinate sales distribution by establishing sales territories, quotas, and goals and establish training programs for sales representatives. Analyze sales statistics gathered by staff to determine sales potential and inventory requirements and monitor the preferences of customers.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner den konkrete distribusjonen eller overføringen av varer og tjenester til kunden. Samordner salgsdistribusjonen ved å opprette salgsområder, -kvoter og -mål å opprette opplæringsprogram for selgere. Analyserer salgsstatistikk ansatte har samlet, for å beregne salgspotensial og behov for inventar, og følge med på hva kundene foretrekker.

title: Public Relations Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate activities designed to create or maintain a favorable public image or raise issue awareness for their organization or client.

title: Fundraising Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate activities to solicit and maintain funds for special projects or nonprofit organizations.

title: Administrative Services Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate one or more administrative services of an organization, such as records and information management, mail distribution, and other office support services.

title: Facilities Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate operations and functionalities of facilities and buildings. May include surrounding grounds or multiple facilities of an organization's campus.

title: Security Managers
description: Direct an organization's security functions, including physical security and safety of employees and facilities.

title: Computer and Information Systems Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate activities in such fields as electronic data processing, information systems, systems analysis, and computer programming.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner aktivitet på områder som elektronisk databehandling, informasjonssystemer, systemanalyse og dataprogrammering.

title: Financial Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate accounting, investing, banking, insurance, securities, and other financial activities of a branch, office, or department of an establishment.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner regnskap, investering, banktjenester, forsikring, verdipapirer og annen økonomisk aktivitet i en avdeling, et kontor eller en underavdeling av en virksomhet.

title: Treasurers and Controllers
description: Direct financial activities, such as planning, procurement, and investments for all or part of an organization.
description_nb: Leder økonomisk aktivitet, som f.eks. planlegging, anskaffelser og investeringer for hele eller deler av en virksomhet.

title: Investment Fund Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate investment strategy or operations for a large pool of liquid assets supplied by institutional investors or individual investors.

title: Industrial Production Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the work activities and resources necessary for manufacturing products in accordance with cost, quality, and quantity specifications.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner driftsaktivitet og ressursene som trengs for å produsere varer i overenstemmelse med kriterier for kostnad, kvalitet og kvantitet.

title: Quality Control Systems Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate quality assurance programs. Formulate quality control policies and control quality of laboratory and production efforts.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner kvalitetssikringsprogrammer. Utformer retningslinjer for kvalitetssikringog kontrollerer kvaliteten på arbeid og produksjon.

title: Geothermal Production Managers
description: Manage operations at geothermal power generation facilities. Maintain and monitor geothermal plant equipment for efficient and safe plant operations.
description_nb: Administrerer driften ved jordvarmeanlegg. Vedlikeholder og overvåker utstyr ved jordvarmekraftverk for effektiv og trygg verksdrift.

title: Biofuels Production Managers
description: Manage biofuels production and plant operations. Collect and process information on plant production and performance, diagnose problems, and design corrective procedures.
description_nb: Administrerer produksjon av biodrivstoff og drift av biokraftverk. Samler og behandler informasjon om produksjon og ytelse ved verket, diagnostiserer problemer og utformer utbedringstiltak.

title: Biomass Power Plant Managers
description: Manage operations at biomass power generation facilities. Direct work activities at plant, including supervision of operations and maintenance staff.
description_nb: Administrerer driften ved biomassekraftverk. Styrer arbeidet på verket, deriblant ledelse av drift og vedlikehold.

title: Hydroelectric Production Managers
description: Manage operations at hydroelectric power generation facilities. Maintain and monitor hydroelectric plant equipment for efficient and safe plant operations.
description_nb: Administrerer driften ved vannkraftverk. Vedlikeholder og overvåker utstyr ved vannkraftverk for effektiv og trygg verksdrift.

title: Purchasing Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the activities of buyers, purchasing officers, and related workers involved in purchasing materials, products, and services. Includes wholesale or retail trade merchandising managers and procurement managers.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner aktivitet blant innkjøpere, innkjøpskonsulenter og andre ansatte som har å gjøre med innkjøp av materialer, varer og tjenester. Inkluderer ledere for masseinnkjøp eller detaljhandelinnkjøp og innkjøpsledere.

title: Transportation, Storage, and Distribution Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate transportation, storage, or distribution activities in accordance with organizational policies and applicable government laws or regulations. Includes logistics managers.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner transport-, lager- eller distribusjonsvirksomhet i overenstemmelse med virksomhetens retningslinjer og relevante lover eller forskrifter. Inkluderer logistikkoperatører.

title: Supply Chain Managers
description: Direct or coordinate production, purchasing, warehousing, distribution, or financial forecasting services or activities to limit costs and improve accuracy, customer service, or safety. Examine existing procedures or opportunities for streamlining activities to meet product distribution needs. Direct the movement, storage, or processing of inventory.

title: Compensation and Benefits Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate compensation and benefits activities of an organization.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner lønnstjenester i en virksomhet.

title: Human Resources Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate human resources activities and staff of an organization.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner drift og ansatte i personalavdelingen i en virksomhet.

title: Training and Development Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the training and development activities and staff of an organization.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner drift og ansatte innen opplæring og utvikling i en virksomhet.

title: Farmers, Ranchers, and Other Agricultural Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the management or operation of farms, ranches, greenhouses, aquacultural operations, nurseries, timber tracts, or other agricultural establishments. May hire, train, and supervise farm workers or contract for services to carry out the day-to-day activities of the managed operation. May engage in or supervise planting, cultivating, harvesting, and financial and marketing activities.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner forvaltning eller drift av gårdsbruk, drivhus, havbruksdrift, planteskoler, tømmerskog eller andre jordbruksvirksomheter. Kan ansette, lære opp og lede gårdsarbeidere eller inngå kontrakter om tjenester for å gjennomføre den daglige driften på stedet. Kan ta del i eller lede planting, kultivering, høsting og oppgaver innen økonomi og markedsføring.

title: Construction Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate, usually through subordinate supervisory personnel, activities concerned with the construction and maintenance of structures, facilities, and systems. Participate in the conceptual development of a construction project and oversee its organization, scheduling, budgeting, and implementation. Includes managers in specialized construction fields, such as carpentry or plumbing.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner – til vanlig ved hjelp av underordnede arbeidsledere – virksomhet som gjelder bygging og vedlikehold av bygninger, anlegg og systemer. Tar del i konseptutvikling av byggeprosjekter og fører oppsyn med organisering, produksjonsstyring, budsjett og gjennomføring. Inkluderer ledere i spesialiserte fagfelt, som tømring eller rørlegging.

title: Education and Childcare Administrators, Preschool and Daycare
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the academic and nonacademic activities of preschool and childcare centers or programs.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner faglig og ikke-faglig virksomhet ved barnehager og barnevernsentre eller -programmer.

title: Education Administrators, Kindergarten through Secondary
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the academic, administrative, or auxiliary activities of public or private elementary or secondary level schools.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner akademisk, administrativ og rådgivende arbeid ved offentlige eller private grunnskoler eller videregående skoler.

title: Education Administrators, Postsecondary
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate research, instructional, student administration and services, and other educational activities at postsecondary institutions, including universities, colleges, and junior and community colleges.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner forskning, undervisning, studentadministrasjon og -tjenester og annen utdanningsvirksomhet ved høyere utdanningsinstitusjoner, herunder universiteter og høyskoler.

title: Education Administrators, All Other
description: All education administrators not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle utdanningsledere som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Architectural and Engineering Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate activities in such fields as architecture and engineering or research and development in these fields.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner virksomhet på felt som arkitektur og teknikk, eller forskning og utvikling på disse feltene.

title: Biofuels/Biodiesel Technology and Product Development Managers
title_nb: Leder for teknologi- og produktutvikling innen biodrivstoff/biodiesel
description: Define, plan, or execute biofuels/biodiesel research programs that evaluate alternative feedstock and process technologies with near-term commercial potential.
description_nb: Definerer, planlegger eller iverksetter forskningsprogrammer for biodrivstoff/biodiesel som evaluerer alternative råmaterialer eller foredlingsteknologier med kortsiktig kommersielt potensial.

title: Food Service Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate activities of an organization or department that serves food and beverages.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner virksomhet i et selskap eller en avdeling som leverer mat og drikke.

title: Gambling Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate gaming operations in a casino. May formulate house rules.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner spillvirksomhet på et kasino. Kan utforme husregler.

title: Entertainment and Recreation Managers, Except Gambling
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate entertainment and recreational activities and operations of a recreational facility, including cruise ships and parks.

title: Lodging Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate activities of an organization or department that provides lodging and other accommodations.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner virksomhet i et selskap eller en avdeling som tilbyr losji eller annen innkvartering.

title: Medical and Health Services Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate medical and health services in hospitals, clinics, managed care organizations, public health agencies, or similar organizations.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner medisinske tjenester og helsetjenester ved sykehus, klinikker, helseforebyggende institusjoner, offentlige helsestasjoner eller liknende virksomheter.

title: Natural Sciences Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate activities in such fields as life sciences, physical sciences, mathematics, statistics, and research and development in these fields.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner aktivitet på fagområder som livsvitenskap, naturvitenskap, matematikk, statistikk og forskning og utvikling på disse områdene.

title: Clinical Research Coordinators
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate clinical research projects. Direct the activities of workers engaged in clinical research projects to ensure compliance with protocols and overall clinical objectives. May evaluate and analyze clinical data.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner kliniske forskningsprosjekter. Leder aktiviteten til ansatte som driver med kliniske forskningsprosjekter, for å se til at disse skjer i overenstemmelse med formelle krav og generelle kliniske formål. Kan også evaluere og analysere kliniske data.

title: Water Resource Specialists
description: Design or implement programs and strategies related to water resource issues such as supply, quality, and regulatory compliance issues.
description_nb: Utforme eller implementere programmer og strategier i tilknytning til vannressurssaker som f.eks. forsyning, kvalitet og spørsmål om overenstemmelse med regelverk.

title: Postmasters and Mail Superintendents
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate operational, administrative, management, and supportive services of a U.S. post office; or coordinate activities of workers engaged in postal and related work in assigned post office.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner driftsmessige og administrative tjenester, ledelse og hjelpetjenester ved postkontor; eller samordner arbeidet til ansatte som jobber med posttjenester eller relatert arbeid ved det tildelte postkontoret.

title: Property, Real Estate, and Community Association Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the selling, buying, leasing, or governance activities of commercial, industrial, or residential real estate properties. Includes managers of homeowner and condominium associations, rented or leased housing units, buildings, or land (including rights-of-way).
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner salg, kjøp, leie og ledelse av kommersielle eller industrielle eiendommer eller boligeiendommer. Inkluderer ledere for sameie- eller selveierforeninger, leide eller leasede boenheter, bygninger eller tomter (inkludert mellomliggende veiområder).

title: Social and Community Service Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the activities of a social service program or community outreach organization. Oversee the program or organization's budget and policies regarding participant involvement, program requirements, and benefits. Work may involve directing social workers, counselors, or probation officers.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner arbeidet i sosialtjenester eller oppsøkende frivillig virksomhet. Fører oppsyn med programmet eller organisasjonens budsjett og retningslinjer for brukerinvolvering, programbetingelser og resultater. Arbeidet kan innebære veiledning av sosialarbeidere, rådgivere eller tilsynsverger.

title: Emergency Management Directors
description: Plan and direct disaster response or crisis management activities, provide disaster preparedness training, and prepare emergency plans and procedures for natural (e.g., hurricanes, floods, earthquakes), wartime, or technological (e.g., nuclear power plant emergencies or hazardous materials spills) disasters or hostage situations.
description_nb: Planlegger og styrer arbeid med katastroferespons og krisehåndtering, gir trening i katastrofeberedskap og forbereder kriseplaner og prosedyrer for naturkatastrofer (f.eks. orkan, flom, jordskjelv), krig, teknologiske katastrofer (f.eks. kjernekraftulykker eller utslipp av farlige stoffer) eller gisselsituasjoner.

title: Funeral Home Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the services or resources of funeral homes. Includes activities such as determining prices for services or merchandise and managing the facilities of funeral homes.

title: Personal Service Managers, All Other
description: All personal service managers not listed separately.

title: Fitness and Wellness Coordinators
description: Manage or coordinate fitness and wellness programs and services. Manage and train staff of wellness specialists, health educators, or fitness instructors.

title: Spa Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate activities of a spa facility. Coordinate programs, schedule and direct staff, and oversee financial activities.

title: Managers, All Other
description: All managers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle ledertyper som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Regulatory Affairs Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate production activities of an organization to ensure compliance with regulations and standard operating procedures.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner produksjonen i en virksomhet for å sikre at den er i overenstemmelse med lover og standard framgangsmåter.

title: Compliance Managers
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate activities of an organization to ensure compliance with ethical or regulatory standards.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner aktiviteten i en virksomhet for å sikre at den er i overenstemmelse med etiske eller juridiske retningslinjer.

title: Loss Prevention Managers
description: Plan and direct policies, procedures, or systems to prevent the loss of assets. Determine risk exposure or potential liability, and develop risk control measures.
description_nb: Planlegger og styrer retningslinjer, prosedyrer eller systemer for å hindre tyveri. Kartlegge risikoeksponering eller potensielle erstatningsansvar og utforme tiltak for risikokontroll.

title: Wind Energy Operations Managers
description: Manage wind field operations, including personnel, maintenance activities, financial activities, and planning.
description_nb: Administrerer drift av vindfelt, herunder personale, vedlikeholdsdrift, økonomisk aktivitet og planlegging.

title: Wind Energy Development Managers
description: Lead or manage the development and evaluation of potential wind energy business opportunities, including environmental studies, permitting, and proposals. May also manage construction of projects.
description_nb: Leder eller administrerer utvikling og evaluering av potensielle muligheter for vindkraftvirksomhet, inkludert miljøundersøkelser, konsesjoner og forslag. Kan også administrere sammensetning av prosjekter.

title: Brownfield Redevelopment Specialists and Site Managers
title_nb: Spesialist på utvikling av tidligere industriområder og feltleder
description: Plan and direct cleanup and redevelopment of contaminated properties for reuse. Does not include properties sufficiently contaminated to qualify as Superfund sites.
description_nb: Planlegger og leder opprydning og sanering av forurenset grunn for nybruk. Omfatter ikke områder som er så forurensede at de omfattes av særordninger.

title: Agents and Business Managers of Artists, Performers, and Athletes
title_nb: Agenter og managere for artister, skuespillere og idrettsutøvere
description: Represent and promote artists, performers, and athletes in dealings with current or prospective employers. May handle contract negotiation and other business matters for clients.
description_nb: Representerer og promoterer artister, skuespillere og idrettsutøvere i forhandlinger med nåværende eller framtidige arbeidsgivere. Kan ta seg av forhandling om kontrakter og andre jobbrelaterte spørsmål for klienter.

title: Buyers and Purchasing Agents, Farm Products
description: Purchase farm products either for further processing or resale. Includes tree farm contractors, grain brokers and market operators, grain buyers, and tobacco buyers.
description_nb: Kjøper inn gårdsprodukter til enten videre foredling eller videresalg. Inkluderer tømmerleverandører, kornhandlere og aksjehandlere, kornkjøpere og tobakkskjøpere.

title: Wholesale and Retail Buyers, Except Farm Products
title_nb: Innkjøpere en gros og en detail, unntatt gårdsprodukter
description: Buy merchandise or commodities, other than farm products, for resale to consumers at the wholesale or retail level, including both durable and nondurable goods. Analyze past buying trends, sales records, price, and quality of merchandise to determine value and yield. Select, order, and authorize payment for merchandise according to contractual agreements. May conduct meetings with sales personnel and introduce new products. Includes assistant wholesale and retail buyers of nonfarm products.
description_nb: Kjøper inn varer eller artikler, utenom gårdsprodukter, for videresalg til forbrukere på parti- eller detaljnivå, inkludert både varige goder og forbruksvarer. Analyserer tidligere kjøpetrender, salgshistorikk, priser og produktkvalitet for å beregne verdi og avkastning. Velger ut, bestiller og godkjenner betaling for varer i tråd med kontraktsmessige avtaler. Kan lede møter med selgere og introdusere nye produkter. Inkluderer assistenter til engros- og detaljhandlere for annet enn gårdsprodukter.

title: Purchasing Agents, Except Wholesale, Retail, and Farm Products
title_nb: Innkjøpsagenter, utenom engroshandel, detaljhandel og gårdsprodukter
description: Purchase machinery, equipment, tools, parts, supplies, or services necessary for the operation of an establishment. Purchase raw or semi-finished materials for manufacturing.
description_nb: Kjøper inn maskinelt utstyr, verktøy, deler, forsyninger eller tjenester som trengs til driften av en virksomhet. Kjøper inn rått eller forbearbeidet materialet til produksjon.

title: Claims Adjusters, Examiners, and Investigators
description: Review settled claims to determine that payments and settlements are made in accordance with company practices and procedures. Confer with legal counsel on claims requiring litigation. May also settle insurance claims.
description_nb: Ser over oppgjorte erstatningskrav for å avgjøre om betalinger og oppgjør er gjennomført i tråd med selskapets praksiser og prosedyrer. Søker juridisk rådgivning om krav som krever rettssak. Kan også gjøre opp erstatningskrav.

title: Insurance Appraisers, Auto Damage
description: Appraise automobile or other vehicle damage to determine repair costs for insurance claim settlement. Prepare insurance forms to indicate repair cost or cost estimates and recommendations. May seek agreement with automotive repair shop on repair costs.
description_nb: Vurderer skade på bil eller annet kjøretøy for å beregne reparasjonskostnader i forsikringsoppgjør. Gjør klar forsikringsskjemaer slik at reparasjonskostnader eller kostnadsestimater og anbefalinger framkommer. Kan forhandle med bilverksteder om reparasjonskostnader.

title: Compliance Officers
description: Examine, evaluate, and investigate eligibility for or conformity with laws and regulations governing contract compliance of licenses and permits, and perform other compliance and enforcement inspection and analysis activities not classified elsewhere.
description_nb: Undersøker, vurderer og utreder relevans for og overenstemmelse med lover og forskrifter som regulerer kontraktsoppfølging av lisenser og løyver, og foretar inspeksjoner av overenstemmelse med og iverksettelse av andre lovkrav og annen analyse som ikke faller inn under andre områder.

title: Environmental Compliance Inspectors
description: Inspect and investigate sources of pollution to protect the public and environment and ensure conformance with Federal, State, and local regulations and ordinances.
description_nb: Inspiserer og undersøker forurensningskilder for å beskytte folk og miljø og sørge for at føderale, delstatlige og lokale regler og forordninger blir fulgt.

title: Equal Opportunity Representatives and Officers
description: Monitor and evaluate compliance with equal opportunity laws, guidelines, and policies to ensure that employment practices and contracting arrangements give equal opportunity without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability.
description_nb: Overvåker og vurderer om praksisen er i tråd med lover, retningslinjer og regler for likestilling for å sikre at ansettelsespraksis og kontraktsinngåelser gir folk like muligheter uavhengig av etnisitet, religion, hudfarge, nasjonal tilhørighet, kjønn, alder eller funksjonsgrad.

title: Government Property Inspectors and Investigators
title_nb: Inspektør og kontrollør av offentlig eiendom
description: Investigate or inspect government property to ensure compliance with contract agreements and government regulations.
description_nb: Undersøker og inspiserer offentlig eiendom for å se til at kontraktskriterier og offentlige reguleringer er fulgt.

title: Coroners
description: Direct activities such as autopsies, pathological and toxicological analyses, and inquests relating to the investigation of deaths occurring within a legal jurisdiction to determine cause of death or to fix responsibility for accidental, violent, or unexplained deaths.
description_nb: Leder aktiviteter som obduksjoner, patologiske og toksikologiske analyser og rettslige undersøkelser i forbindelse med etterforskning av dødsfall innen et jurisdiksjonsområde for å fastslå dødsårsak eller å fastsette ansvaret for ulykkesdødsfall, voldelige dødsfall eller uoppklarte dødsfall.

title: Regulatory Affairs Specialists
description: Coordinate and document internal regulatory processes, such as internal audits, inspections, license renewals, or registrations. May compile and prepare materials for submission to regulatory agencies.
description_nb: Samordner og dokumenterer interne reguleringsprosesser, f.eks. internrevisjoner, inspeksjoner, fornyelse av lisenser og registreringer. Kan sammenfatte og forberede materiale som skal legges fram for kontrollmyndigheter.

title: Customs Brokers
description: Prepare customs documentation and ensure that shipments meet all applicable laws to facilitate the import and export of goods. Determine and track duties and taxes payable and process payments on behalf of client. Sign documents under a power of attorney. Represent clients in meetings with customs officials and apply for duty refunds and tariff reclassifications. Coordinate transportation and storage of imported goods.

title: Cost Estimators
description: Prepare cost estimates for product manufacturing, construction projects, or services to aid management in bidding on or determining price of product or service. May specialize according to particular service performed or type of product manufactured.
description_nb: Klargjør kostnadsestimat for vareproduksjon, byggeprosjekter eller tjenester som skal hjelpe administrasjonen til budgivning eller å fastsette priser på varer eller tjenester. Kan spesialisere seg innen en bestemt tjeneste eller en type vareproduksjon.

title: Human Resources Specialists
description: Perform activities in the human resource area. Includes employment specialists who screen, recruit, interview, and place workers.
description_nb: Arbeider med personalsaker. Inkluderer ansettelsesspesialister som screener, rekrutterer, intervjuer og plasserer arbeidstakere.

title: Farm Labor Contractors
description: Recruit and hire seasonal or temporary agricultural laborers. May transport, house, and provide meals for workers.
description_nb: Rekrutterer og hyrer inn sesongarbeidere eller midlertidig ansatte til jordbruksarbeid. Kan transportere, huse og ordne mat til arbeidstakere.

title: Labor Relations Specialists
description: Resolve disputes between workers and managers, negotiate collective bargaining agreements, or coordinate grievance procedures to handle employee complaints.
description_nb: Løser konflikter mellom arbeidstakere og ledere, forhandler om kollektive forhandlingsavtaler eller samordner klageprosedyrer for å behandle klager fra ansatte.

title: Logisticians
description: Analyze and coordinate the logistical functions of a firm or organization. Responsible for the entire life cycle of a product, including acquisition, distribution, internal allocation, delivery, and final disposal of resources.
description_nb: Analyserer og koordinerer logistikkarbeidet i et firma eller en virksomhet. Er ansvarlig for hele livssyklusen til en vare, inkludert anskaffelse, distribusjon, intern flytting, leveranse og endelig avhending av ressurser.

title: Logistics Engineers
description: Design or analyze operational solutions for projects such as transportation optimization, network modeling, process and methods analysis, cost containment, capacity enhancement, routing and shipment optimization, or information management.
description_nb: Utformer eller analyserer driftsløsninger for prosjekter som f.eks. transportoptimalisering, nettverksplanlegging, prosess- og metodeanalyser, kostnadsbesparelser, kapasitetsforbedring, optimalisering av sending og frakting eller informasjonsforvaltning.

title: Logistics Analysts
description: Analyze product delivery or supply chain processes to identify or recommend changes. May manage route activity including invoicing, electronic bills, and shipment tracing.
description_nb: Analyserer prosesser i produktleveranse eller forsyningskjeder for å oppdage eller anbefale endringer. Kan administrere forsendelser, herunder fakturering, e-fakturering og sporing av forsendelser.

title: Project Management Specialists
description: Analyze and coordinate the schedule, timeline, procurement, staffing, and budget of a product or service on a per project basis. Lead and guide the work of technical staff. May serve as a point of contact for the client or customer.

title: Management Analysts
description: Conduct organizational studies and evaluations, design systems and procedures, conduct work simplification and measurement studies, and prepare operations and procedures manuals to assist management in operating more efficiently and effectively. Includes program analysts and management consultants.
description_nb: Utfører og evaluerer organisasjonsundersøkelser, utformer ordninger og prosedyrer, gjør undersøkelser av arbeidsforenkling og -måling og forbereder drifts- og prosedyreveiledninger for å bistå ledelsen i å drive mer effektivt og virksomt. Inkluderer programanalytikere og ledelseskonsulenter

title: Meeting, Convention, and Event Planners
description: Coordinate activities of staff, convention personnel, or clients to make arrangements for group meetings, events, or conventions.
description_nb: Samordner arbeidet for ansatte, stevnepersonale eller klienter for å forberede gruppemøter, arrangementer eller stevner.

title: Fundraisers
description: Organize activities to raise funds or otherwise solicit and gather monetary donations or other gifts for an organization. May design and produce promotional materials. May also raise awareness of the organization's work, goals, and financial needs.
description_nb: Organiserer arbeidet med å samle inn penger eller på andre måter utbe og samle inn pengegaver eller andre gaver på vegne av en virksomhet. Kan også designe og produsere markedsføringsmateriale. Kan også bekjentgjøre virksomhetens arbeid, mål og finansielle behov.

title: Compensation, Benefits, and Job Analysis Specialists
title_nb: Spesialist innen vederlag, utbytte og jobbanalyse
description: Conduct programs of compensation and benefits and job analysis for employer. May specialize in specific areas, such as position classification and pension programs.
description_nb: Gjennomfører programmer for vederlags-, utbytte- og jobbanalyse for arbeidsgiver. Kan spesialisere seg innen visse felt, f.eks. stillingsklassifisering og pensjonsordninger.

title: Training and Development Specialists
description: Design and conduct training and development programs to improve individual and organizational performance. May analyze training needs.
description_nb: Lager og gjennomfører opplærings- og utviklingsprogrammer for å forbedre prestasjoner på individ- eller virksomhetsnivå. Kan analysere opplæringsbehov.

title: Market Research Analysts and Marketing Specialists
description: Research market conditions in local, regional, or national areas, or gather information to determine potential sales of a product or service, or create a marketing campaign. May gather information on competitors, prices, sales, and methods of marketing and distribution.
description_nb: Undersøker markedsforhold lokalt, regionalt eller nasjonalt, innhenter informasjon for å beregne salgspotensialet for en vare eller tjeneste, eller lager markedsføringskampanjer. Kan innhente informasjon om konkurrenter, priser, salg og metoder for markedsføring og distribusjon.

title: Search Marketing Strategists
description: Employ search marketing tactics to increase visibility and engagement with content, products, or services in Internet-enabled devices or interfaces. Examine search query behaviors on general or specialty search engines or other Internet-based content. Analyze research, data, or technology to understand user intent and measure outcomes for ongoing optimization.

title: Business Operations Specialists, All Other
description: All business operations specialists not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle spesialister innen næringsvirksomhet som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Business Continuity Planners
description: Develop, maintain, or implement business continuity and disaster recovery strategies and solutions, including risk assessments, business impact analyses, strategy selection, and documentation of business continuity and disaster recovery procedures. Plan, conduct, and debrief regular mock-disaster exercises to test the adequacy of existing plans and strategies, updating procedures and plans regularly. Act as a coordinator for continuity efforts after a disruption event.
description_nb: Utvikler, opprettholder eller iverksetter strategier og løsninger for driftskontinuitet og gjenoppbygging etter kriser, herunder risikoanalyser, konsekvensanalyse for driftsopphold, valg av strategi og dokumentasjon av prosedyrer for driftskontinuitet og gjenreisning etter kriser. Planlegger, gjennomfører og avlegger rapport om kriseøvelser for å teste at eksisterende planer og strategier er tilstrekkelige, og oppdatere prosedyrer og planer jevnlig. Er koordinator for kontinuitetstiltak etter et avbrudd.

title: Sustainability Specialists
description: Address organizational sustainability issues, such as waste stream management, green building practices, and green procurement plans.
description_nb: Tar opp bærekraftssaker i virksomheten, som f.eks. håndtering av avfallsstrømmer, grønne byggløsninger og grønne anskaffelsesplaner.

title: Online Merchants
description: Conduct retail activities of businesses operating exclusively online. May perform duties such as preparing business strategies, buying merchandise, managing inventory, implementing marketing activities, fulfilling and shipping online orders, and balancing financial records.
description_nb: Leder detaljhandel for bedrifter som utelukkende opererer på nett. Kan utføre oppgaver som f.eks. å forberede forretningsstrategier, kjøpe inn varer, holde styr på inventar, implementere markedsføringstiltak, fullføre og sende nettbestillinger og saldere regnskap.

title: Security Management Specialists
description: Conduct security assessments for organizations, and design security systems and processes. May specialize in areas such as physical security or the safety of employees and facilities.

title: Accountants and Auditors
description: Examine, analyze, and interpret accounting records to prepare financial statements, give advice, or audit and evaluate statements prepared by others. Install or advise on systems of recording costs or other financial and budgetary data.
description_nb: Kontrollerer, analyserer og fortolker regnskapene for å forberede finansregnskap, gi råd eller revidere og evaluere regnskap andre har forberedt. Installere eller gi veiledning om ordninger for å registrerer kostnader og andre finans- og budsjettopplysninger.

title: Appraisers of Personal and Business Property
description: Appraise and estimate the fair value of tangible personal or business property, such as jewelry, art, antiques, collectibles, and equipment. May also appraise land.

title: Appraisers and Assessors of Real Estate
description: Appraise real estate, exclusively, and estimate its fair value. May assess taxes in accordance with prescribed schedules.

title: Budget Analysts
description: Examine budget estimates for completeness, accuracy, and conformance with procedures and regulations. Analyze budgeting and accounting reports.
description_nb: Undersøker om budsjettoverslag er fullstendige, nøyaktige og i overenstemmelse med prosedyrer og forskrifter. Analyserer budsjett- og regnskapsrapporter.

title: Credit Analysts
description: Analyze credit data and financial statements of individuals or firms to determine the degree of risk involved in extending credit or lending money. Prepare reports with credit information for use in decision making.
description_nb: Analyserer kredittinformasjon og regnskap for enkeltpersoner eller firmaer for å beregne risikograden ved utvidet kreditt eller lån. Klargjør rapporter med kredittinformasjon som grunnlag for avgjørelser.

title: Financial and Investment Analysts
description: Conduct quantitative analyses of information affecting investment programs of public or private institutions.
description_nb: Gjennomfører kvantitative analyser av informasjon som vedkommer investeringsprogrammer i offentlige eller private institusjoner.

title: Personal Financial Advisors
description: Advise clients on financial plans using knowledge of tax and investment strategies, securities, insurance, pension plans, and real estate. Duties include assessing clients' assets, liabilities, cash flow, insurance coverage, tax status, and financial objectives.
description_nb: Gir råd til klienter om økonomiske planer ved å ta i bruk kunnskap om skatte- og investeringsstrategier, verdipapirer, forsikring, pensjonsplaner og eiendom. Arbeidsoppgaver omfatter å taksere klientens aktiva, passiva, kontantstrøm, forsikringsdekning, skattestatus og økonomiske målsettinger.

title: Insurance Underwriters
description: Review individual applications for insurance to evaluate degree of risk involved and determine acceptance of applications.
description_nb: Går gjennom søknader om forsikring for å vurdere hvilken grad av risiko som er involvert, og avgjøre om hvorvidt søknader skal innvilges.

title: Financial Risk Specialists
description: Analyze and measure exposure to credit and market risk threatening the assets, earning capacity, or economic state of an organization. May make recommendations to limit risk.

title: Financial Examiners
description: Enforce or ensure compliance with laws and regulations governing financial and securities institutions and financial and real estate transactions. May examine, verify, or authenticate records.
description_nb: Håndhever eller ser til at lover og regler som regulerer finans- og verdipapirvirksomhet og finans- og eiendomstransaksjoner, blir fulgt. Kan granske, verifisere eller autentisere journaler.

title: Credit Counselors
description: Advise and educate individuals or organizations on acquiring and managing debt. May provide guidance in determining the best type of loan and explaining loan requirements or restrictions. May help develop debt management plans, advise on credit issues, or provide budget, mortgage, and bankruptcy counseling.
description_nb: Rådgir og lærer opp enkeltpersoner eller virksomheter om å oppta og betjene gjeld. Kan gi råd om beste låntype og forklare kriterier og restriksjoner for lån. Kan bistå i utvikling av betjeningsplaner for gjeld, gi råd i kredittspørsmål eller tilby rådgivning i spørsmål om budsjett, pantelån og konkurs.

title: Loan Officers
description: Evaluate, authorize, or recommend approval of commercial, real estate, or credit loans. Advise borrowers on financial status and payment methods. Includes mortgage loan officers and agents, collection analysts, loan servicing officers, and loan underwriters.
description_nb: Evaluerer, autoriserer eller anbefaler innvilgning av forretningslån, boliglån eller kreditt. Rådgir låntakere om økonomisk status og betalingsmetoder. Inkluderer konsulenter og agenter for pantelån, oppkrevingsanalytikere, innkrevere og långivere.

title: Tax Examiners and Collectors, and Revenue Agents
description: Determine tax liability or collect taxes from individuals or business firms according to prescribed laws and regulations.
description_nb: Fastsetter skatteplikt eller krever inn skatter fra enkeltpersoner eller virksomheter i tråd med gjeldende lover og regler.

title: Tax Preparers
description: Prepare tax returns for individuals or small businesses.
description_nb: Klargjør selvangivelser/næringsmeldinger for enkeltpersoner eller små foretak.

title: Financial Specialists, All Other
description: All financial specialists not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle andre finansspesialister som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Financial Quantitative Analysts
description: Develop quantitative financial products used to inform individuals or financial institutions engaged in saving, lending, investing, borrowing, or managing risk. Investigate methods for financial analysis to create mathematical models used to develop improved analytical tools or advanced financial investment instruments.
description_nb: Utvikler kvantitative finansprodukter for å opplyse enkeltpersoner eller finansinstitusjoner som driver med sparing, utlån, investering, låntaking eller risikoforvaltning. Undersøker finansanalytiske metoder for å utforme matematiske modeller til bruk til å utvikle forbedrede analytiske verktøy eller avanserte verktøy til finansielle investeringer.

title: Fraud Examiners, Investigators and Analysts
description: Obtain evidence, take statements, produce reports, and testify to findings regarding resolution of fraud allegations. May coordinate fraud detection and prevention activities.
description_nb: Samler bevis, opptar forklaring, utformer rapporter og vitner om funnene i forbindelse med oppklaring av bedragerianklager. Kan samordne arbeid med oppdagelse og forebygging av bedrageri.

title: Computer Systems Analysts
description: Analyze science, engineering, business, and other data processing problems to develop and implement solutions to complex applications problems, system administration issues, or network concerns. Perform systems management and integration functions, improve existing computer systems, and review computer system capabilities, workflow, and schedule limitations. May analyze or recommend commercially available software.

title: Health Informatics Specialists
description: Apply knowledge of nursing and informatics to assist in the design, development, and ongoing modification of computerized health care systems. May educate staff and assist in problem solving to promote the implementation of the health care system.

title: Information Security Analysts
description: Plan, implement, upgrade, or monitor security measures for the protection of computer networks and information. Assess system vulnerabilities for security risks and propose and implement risk mitigation strategies. May ensure appropriate security controls are in place that will safeguard digital files and vital electronic infrastructure. May respond to computer security breaches and viruses.

title: Computer and Information Research Scientists
description: Conduct research into fundamental computer and information science as theorists, designers, or inventors. Develop solutions to problems in the field of computer hardware and software.

title: Computer Network Support Specialists
description: Analyze, test, troubleshoot, and evaluate existing network systems, such as local area networks (LAN), wide area networks (WAN), cloud networks, servers, and other data communications networks. Perform network maintenance to ensure networks operate correctly with minimal interruption.

title: Computer User Support Specialists
description: Provide technical assistance to computer users. Answer questions or resolve computer problems for clients in person, via telephone, or electronically. May provide assistance concerning the use of computer hardware and software, including printing, installation, word processing, electronic mail, and operating systems.

title: Computer Network Architects
description: Design and implement computer and information networks, such as local area networks (LAN), wide area networks (WAN), intranets, extranets, and other data communications networks. Perform network modeling, analysis, and planning, including analysis of capacity needs for network infrastructures. May also design network and computer security measures. May research and recommend network and data communications hardware and software.

title: Telecommunications Engineering Specialists
description: Design or configure wired, wireless, and satellite communications systems for voice, video, and data services. Supervise installation, service, and maintenance.

title: Database Administrators
description: Administer, test, and implement computer databases, applying knowledge of database management systems. Coordinate changes to computer databases. Identify, investigate, and resolve database performance issues, database capacity, and database scalability. May plan, coordinate, and implement security measures to safeguard computer databases.

title: Database Architects
description: Design strategies for enterprise databases, data warehouse systems, and multidimensional networks. Set standards for database operations, programming, query processes, and security. Model, design, and construct large relational databases or data warehouses. Create and optimize data models for warehouse infrastructure and workflow. Integrate new systems with existing warehouse structure and refine system performance and functionality.

title: Data Warehousing Specialists
description: Design, model, or implement corporate data warehousing activities. Program and configure warehouses of database information and provide support to warehouse users.

title: Network and Computer Systems Administrators
description: Install, configure, and maintain an organization's local area network (LAN), wide area network (WAN), data communications network, operating systems, and physical and virtual servers. Perform system monitoring and verify the integrity and availability of hardware, network, and server resources and systems. Review system and application logs and verify completion of scheduled jobs, including system backups. Analyze network and server resource consumption and control user access. Install and upgrade software and maintain software licenses. May assist in network modeling, analysis, planning, and coordination between network and data communications hardware and software.

title: Computer Programmers
description: Create, modify, and test the code and scripts that allow computer applications to run. Work from specifications drawn up by software and web developers or other individuals. May develop and write computer programs to store, locate, and retrieve specific documents, data, and information.

title: Software Developers
description: Research, design, and develop computer and network software or specialized utility programs. Analyze user needs and develop software solutions, applying principles and techniques of computer science, engineering, and mathematical analysis. Update software or enhance existing software capabilities. May work with computer hardware engineers to integrate hardware and software systems, and develop specifications and performance requirements. May maintain databases within an application area, working individually or coordinating database development as part of a team.

title: Software Quality Assurance Analysts and Testers
description: Develop and execute software tests to identify software problems and their causes. Test system modifications to prepare for implementation. Document software and application defects using a bug tracking system and report defects to software or web developers. Create and maintain databases of known defects. May participate in software design reviews to provide input on functional requirements, operational characteristics, product designs, and schedules.

title: Web Developers
description: Develop and implement websites, web applications, application databases, and interactive web interfaces. Evaluate code to ensure that it is properly structured, meets industry standards, and is compatible with browsers and devices. Optimize website performance, scalability, and server-side code and processes. May develop website infrastructure and integrate websites with other computer applications.

title: Web and Digital Interface Designers
description: Design digital user interfaces or websites. Develop and test layouts, interfaces, functionality, and navigation menus to ensure compatibility and usability across browsers or devices. May use web framework applications as well as client-side code and processes. May evaluate web design following web and accessibility standards, and may analyze web use metrics and optimize websites for marketability and search engine ranking. May design and test interfaces that facilitate the human-computer interaction and maximize the usability of digital devices, websites, and software with a focus on aesthetics and design. May create graphics used in websites and manage website content and links.

title: Video Game Designers
description: Design core features of video games. Specify innovative game and role-play mechanics, story lines, and character biographies. Create and maintain design documentation. Guide and collaborate with production staff to produce games as designed.

title: Computer Occupations, All Other
description: All computer occupations not listed separately.

title: Web Administrators
description: Manage web environment design, deployment, development and maintenance activities. Perform testing and quality assurance of web sites and web applications.

title: Geographic Information Systems Technologists and Technicians
description: Assist scientists or related professionals in building, maintaining, modifying, or using geographic information systems (GIS) databases. May also perform some custom application development or provide user support.

title: Document Management Specialists
description: Implement and administer enterprise-wide document management systems and related procedures that allow organizations to capture, store, retrieve, share, and destroy electronic records and documents.

title: Penetration Testers
description: Evaluate network system security by conducting simulated internal and external cyberattacks using adversary tools and techniques. Attempt to breach and exploit critical systems and gain access to sensitive information to assess system security.

title: Information Security Engineers
description: Develop and oversee the implementation of information security procedures and policies. Build, maintain and upgrade security technology, such as firewalls, for the safe use of computer networks and the transmission and retrieval of information. Design and implement appropriate security controls to identify vulnerabilities and protect digital files and electronic infrastructures. Monitor and respond to computer security breaches, viruses, and intrusions, and perform forensic investigation. May oversee the assessment of information security systems.

title: Digital Forensics Analysts
description: Conduct investigations on computer-based crimes establishing documentary or physical evidence, such as digital media and logs associated with cyber intrusion incidents. Analyze digital evidence and investigate computer security incidents to derive information in support of system and network vulnerability mitigation. Preserve and present computer-related evidence in support of criminal, fraud, counterintelligence, or law enforcement investigations.

title: Blockchain Engineers
description: Maintain and support distributed and decentralized blockchain-based networks or block-chain applications such as cryptocurrency exchange, payment processing, document sharing, and digital voting. Design and deploy secure block-chain design patterns and solutions over geographically distributed networks using advanced technologies. May assist with infrastructure setup and testing for application transparency and security.

title: Computer Systems Engineers/Architects
description: Design and develop solutions to complex applications problems, system administration issues, or network concerns. Perform systems management and integration functions.

title: Information Technology Project Managers
description: Plan, initiate, and manage information technology (IT) projects. Lead and guide the work of technical staff. Serve as liaison between business and technical aspects of projects. Plan project stages and assess business implications for each stage. Monitor progress to assure deadlines, standards, and cost targets are met.

title: Actuaries
description: Analyze statistical data, such as mortality, accident, sickness, disability, and retirement rates and construct probability tables to forecast risk and liability for payment of future benefits. May ascertain insurance rates required and cash reserves necessary to ensure payment of future benefits.
description_nb: Analyserer statistiske data, f.eks. om mortalitet-, ulykkes-, sykdoms-, funksjonshemmings- og pensjonsrater og lage sannsynlighetstabeller for å framskrive risiko og betalingsansvar for framtidige ytelser. Kan få rede på påkrevde forsikringsgrader og pengereserver som trengs for å kunne utbetale framtidige ytelser.

title: Mathematicians
description: Conduct research in fundamental mathematics or in application of mathematical techniques to science, management, and other fields. Solve problems in various fields using mathematical methods.
description_nb: Forsker på grunnleggende matematikk eller på anvendelse av matematiske teknikker i vitenskap, administrasjon og andre felt. Løser problemer på forskjellige områder ved å bruke matematiske metoder.

title: Operations Research Analysts
description: Formulate and apply mathematical modeling and other optimizing methods to develop and interpret information that assists management with decision making, policy formulation, or other managerial functions. May collect and analyze data and develop decision support software, service, or products. May develop and supply optimal time, cost, or logistics networks for program evaluation, review, or implementation.
description_nb: Utformer og anvender matematiske modeller og andre optimeringsmetoder for å frambringe og tolke informasjon som er til hjelp for ledelsen ved å ta avgjørelser, utforme retningslinjer eller andre styringsoppgaver. Kan innhente og analysere data og utvikle programvare, tjenester eller produkter innen beslutningsstøtte. Kan utforme og legge fram nettverksdiagrammer over optimal tid, kostnad og logistikk til programevaluering, gjennomsyn og iverksetting.

title: Statisticians
description: Develop or apply mathematical or statistical theory and methods to collect, organize, interpret, and summarize numerical data to provide usable information. May specialize in fields such as bio-statistics, agricultural statistics, business statistics, or economic statistics. Includes mathematical and survey statisticians.
description_nb: Utvikler eller anvender matematisk eller statistisk teori og metode for å innhente, organisere, tolke og oppsummere numerisk data for å frambringe nyttig informasjon. Kan spesialisere seg på områder som biostatistikk, jordbruksstatistikk, forretningsstatistikk eller økonomisk statistikk. Inkluderer statistikere med matematikk og spørreundersøkelser som fagfelt.

title: Biostatisticians
description: Develop and apply biostatistical theory and methods to the study of life sciences.
description_nb: Utvikler og anvender biostatistisk teori og metode i livsvitenskapsstudier.

title: Data Scientists
description: Develop and implement a set of techniques or analytics applications to transform raw data into meaningful information using data-oriented programming languages and visualization software. Apply data mining, data modeling, natural language processing, and machine learning to extract and analyze information from large structured and unstructured datasets. Visualize, interpret, and report data findings. May create dynamic data reports.

title: Business Intelligence Analysts
description: Produce financial and market intelligence by querying data repositories and generating periodic reports. Devise methods for identifying data patterns and trends in available information sources.

title: Clinical Data Managers
description: Apply knowledge of health care and database management to analyze clinical data, and to identify and report trends.

title: Mathematical Science Occupations, All Other
title_nb: Yrker innen matematisk vitenskap, alle andre
description: All mathematical scientists not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle matematikkfaglige yrker som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Bioinformatics Technicians
description: Apply principles and methods of bioinformatics to assist scientists in areas such as pharmaceuticals, medical technology, biotechnology, computational biology, proteomics, computer information science, biology and medical informatics. Apply bioinformatics tools to visualize, analyze, manipulate or interpret molecular data. May build and maintain databases for processing and analyzing genomic or other biological information.

title: Architects, Except Landscape and Naval
description: Plan and design structures, such as private residences, office buildings, theaters, factories, and other structural property.
description_nb: Planlegger og designer bygninger, herunder privatboliger, kontorbygg, teatre, fabrikker og andre bygg.

title: Landscape Architects
description: Plan and design land areas for projects such as parks and other recreational facilities, airports, highways, hospitals, schools, land subdivisions, and commercial, industrial, and residential sites.
description_nb: Planlegger og designer landområder for prosjekter som f.eks. parker og andre rekreasjonsområder, flyplasser, motorveier, sykehus, skoler, utviklingstomter og nærings-, industri- og boligområder.

title: Cartographers and Photogrammetrists
description: Collect, analyze, and interpret geographic information provided by geodetic surveys, aerial photographs, and satellite data. Research, study, and prepare maps and other spatial data in digital or graphic form for legal, social, political, educational, and design purposes. May work with Geographic Information Systems (GIS). May design and evaluate algorithms, data structures, and user interfaces for GIS and mapping systems.
description_nb: Innhenter, analyserer og fortolker geografisk informasjon fra geodetiske undersøkelser, luftfotografi og satellittdata. Undersøker, studerer og gjør klar kart og annen områdedata i digitalt eller trykt format til juridisk, sosial og politisk bruk og skole- og designbruk. Kan arbeide med geografiske informasjonssystemer (GIS). Kan utforme og vurdere algoritmer, datastrukturer og brukergrensesnitt for GIS- og kartsystemer.

title: Surveyors
description: Make exact measurements and determine property boundaries. Provide data relevant to the shape, contour, gravitation, location, elevation, or dimension of land or land features on or near the earth's surface for engineering, mapmaking, mining, land evaluation, construction, and other purposes.
description_nb: Tar eksakte mål og fastsetter tomtegrenser. Gir informasjon om form, høydekurver, helling, beliggenhet, stigning eller størrelse på landområder eller landskapstrekk på eller i nærheten av jordoverflaten til formål som ingeniørarbeid, kartlaging, gruvedrift, landheving, bygging eller liknende.

title: Geodetic Surveyors
description: Measure large areas of the Earth's surface using satellite observations, global navigation satellite systems (GNSS), light detection and ranging (LIDAR), or related sources.
description_nb: Måler større områder på jordoverflaten ved bruk av satellittobservasjoner, satellittnavigasjonssystemer (GNSS), optisk fjernmåling (lidar) eller tilsvarende.

title: Aerospace Engineers
description: Perform engineering duties in designing, constructing, and testing aircraft, missiles, and spacecraft. May conduct basic and applied research to evaluate adaptability of materials and equipment to aircraft design and manufacture. May recommend improvements in testing equipment and techniques.
description_nb: Utfører ingeniøroppgaver i utforming, bygging og testing av luftfartøy, missiler og romfartøy. Kan lede grunnleggende og anvendt forskning for å evaluere anvendelsesområder for materialer og utstyr til utforming og produksjon av luftfartøy. Kan anbefale forbedringer i testutstyr og -teknikk.

title: Agricultural Engineers
description: Apply knowledge of engineering technology and biological science to agricultural problems concerned with power and machinery, electrification, structures, soil and water conservation, and processing of agricultural products.
description_nb: Anvender kunnskap innen ingeniørteknikk og biologi på jordbruksrelaterte problemer knyttet til energi og maskineri, elektrifisering, anlegg, jord- og vannvern og prosessering av jordbruksvarer.

title: Bioengineers and Biomedical Engineers
description: Apply knowledge of engineering, biology, and biomechanical principles to the design, development, and evaluation of biological and health systems and products, such as artificial organs, prostheses, instrumentation, medical information systems, and health management and care delivery systems.
description_nb: Anvender kunnskap innen ingeniørtekniske, biologiske og biomekaniske prinsipper for å utforme, utvikle og evaluere biologi- og helsesystemer og -produkter, f.eks. kunstige organer, proteser, instrumentering, medisinske informasjonssystemer og systemer for helseledelse og -tjenesteyting.

title: Chemical Engineers
description: Design chemical plant equipment and devise processes for manufacturing chemicals and products, such as gasoline, synthetic rubber, plastics, detergents, cement, paper, and pulp, by applying principles and technology of chemistry, physics, and engineering.
description_nb: Designer utstyr til kjemiske anlegg og planlegger produksjonsprosesser for kjemikalier og produkter som bensin, syntetisk gummi, plast, vaskemidler, sement, papir og tremasse ved å anvende prinsipper og teknologi innen kjemi, fysikk og ingeniørarbeid.

title: Civil Engineers
description: Perform engineering duties in planning, designing, and overseeing construction and maintenance of building structures, and facilities, such as roads, railroads, airports, bridges, harbors, channels, dams, irrigation projects, pipelines, power plants, and water and sewage systems.
description_nb: Utfører ingeniøroppgaver innen planlegging, utforming og tilsyn med utbygging og vedlikehold av bygninger og fasiliteter, som f.eks. veier, jernbaner, flyplasser, broer, havner, kanaler, demninger, vanningsanlegg, rørledninger, kraftverk og vann- og avløpssystemer.

title: Transportation Engineers
description: Develop plans for surface transportation projects, according to established engineering standards and state or federal construction policy. Prepare designs, specifications, or estimates for transportation facilities. Plan modifications of existing streets, highways, or freeways to improve traffic flow.
description_nb: Utvikler planer for overflatetransportprosjekter i tråd med etablert tekniske standarder og regionale og nasjonale byggeforskrifter. Forbereder design, spesifikasjoner eller estimater til transportfasiliteter. Planlegger endringer av eksisterende veier og motorveier for å bedre trafikkflyten.

title: Water/Wastewater Engineers
description: Design or oversee projects involving provision of potable water, disposal of wastewater and sewage, or prevention of flood-related damage. Prepare environmental documentation for water resources, regulatory program compliance, data management and analysis, and field work. Perform hydraulic modeling and pipeline design.

title: Computer Hardware Engineers
description: Research, design, develop, or test computer or computer-related equipment for commercial, industrial, military, or scientific use. May supervise the manufacturing and installation of computer or computer-related equipment and components.
description_nb: Forsker på, utformer, utvikler eller tester datautstyr eller tilhørende utstyr til kommersiell, industriell, militær eller vitenskapelig bruk. Kan lede produksjon og installasjon av datautstyr og -komponenter eller tilhørende utstyr og komponenter.

title: Electrical Engineers
description: Research, design, develop, test, or supervise the manufacturing and installation of electrical equipment, components, or systems for commercial, industrial, military, or scientific use.
description_nb: Forsker på, utformer, utvikler, tester eller leder produksjon og installasjon av elektrisk utstyr, komponenter eller systemer til kommersiell, industriell, militær eller vitenskapelig bruk.

title: Electronics Engineers, Except Computer
description: Research, design, develop, or test electronic components and systems for commercial, industrial, military, or scientific use employing knowledge of electronic theory and materials properties. Design electronic circuits and components for use in fields such as telecommunications, aerospace guidance and propulsion control, acoustics, or instruments and controls.
description_nb: Forsker på, utformer, utvikler eller tester elektroniske komponenter og systemer til kommersiell, industriell, militær eller vitenskapelig bruk ved å anvende kunnskap om elektronisk teori og materialegenskaper. Designer elektroniske kretser og komponenter til bruk på områder som telekommunikasjon, luftfartskontroll og framdriftskontroll, akustikk eller instrumenter og kontroller.

title: Radio Frequency Identification Device Specialists
description: Design and implement radio frequency identification device (RFID) systems used to track shipments or goods.
description_nb: Designer og implementerer RFID-enheter brukt til å spore forsendelser eller varer.

title: Environmental Engineers
description: Research, design, plan, or perform engineering duties in the prevention, control, and remediation of environmental hazards using various engineering disciplines. Work may include waste treatment, site remediation, or pollution control technology.
description_nb: Undersøker, utformer, planlegger eller utfører ingeniøroppgaver innen forebygging, kontroll og opprydding av miljørisikoer ved å bruke forskjellige ingeniørdisipliner. Arbeidet kan være f.eks. avfallshåndtering, områdesanering eller teknologi innen forurensningskontroll.

title: Health and Safety Engineers, Except Mining Safety Engineers and Inspectors
description: Promote worksite or product safety by applying knowledge of industrial processes, mechanics, chemistry, psychology, and industrial health and safety laws. Includes industrial product safety engineers.
description_nb: Fremmer sikkerhet på arbeidsplassen eller produktsikkerhet ved å ta i bruk kunnskap om industriprosesser, mekanikk, kjemi, psykologi og lover for bedriftshelse og -sikkerhet. Omfatter produktsikkerhetsingeniører.

title: Fire-Prevention and Protection Engineers
description: Research causes of fires, determine fire protection methods, and design or recommend materials or equipment such as structural components or fire-detection equipment to assist organizations in safeguarding life and property against fire, explosion, and related hazards.
description_nb: Undersøker brannårsaker, planlegger brannvernstiltak og utformer eller anbefaler materialer og utstyr så som bygningskomponenter eller brannvarslingsutstyr for å hjelpe virksomheter med å verne folk og eiendom mot brann, eksplosjoner eller liknende farer.

title: Industrial Engineers
description: Design, develop, test, and evaluate integrated systems for managing industrial production processes, including human work factors, quality control, inventory control, logistics and material flow, cost analysis, and production coordination.
description_nb: Utformer, utvikler, tester og evaluerer integrerte systemer for administrasjon av industrielle produksjonsprosesser, herunder menneskelige faktorer, kvalitetssikring, inventarkontroll, logistikk og materialflyt, kostnadsanalyser og samordning av produksjon.

title: Human Factors Engineers and Ergonomists
description: Design objects, facilities, and environments to optimize human well-being and overall system performance, applying theory, principles, and data regarding the relationship between humans and respective technology. Investigate and analyze characteristics of human behavior and performance as it relates to the use of technology.
description_nb: Designer gjenstander, anlegg og omgivelser slik at menneskelig trivsel og generell prestasjonsevne er best mulig, ved å bruke teori, prinsipper og informasjon om forholdet mellom mennesker og teknologi. Undersøker og analyserer kjennetegn ved menneskelig oppførsel og prestasjonsevne i tilknytning til bruken av teknologi.

title: Validation Engineers
description: Design or plan protocols for equipment or processes to produce products meeting internal and external purity, safety, and quality requirements.

title: Manufacturing Engineers
description: Design, integrate, or improve manufacturing systems or related processes. May work with commercial or industrial designers to refine product designs to increase producibility and decrease costs.

title: Marine Engineers and Naval Architects
description: Design, develop, and evaluate the operation of marine vessels, ship machinery, and related equipment, such as power supply and propulsion systems.
description_nb: Utformer, utvikler og evaluerer drift av sjøfartøyer, skipsmaskineri og tilhørende utstyr, som f.eks. strømforsyning og framdriftssystemer.

title: Materials Engineers
description: Evaluate materials and develop machinery and processes to manufacture materials for use in products that must meet specialized design and performance specifications. Develop new uses for known materials. Includes those engineers working with composite materials or specializing in one type of material, such as graphite, metal and metal alloys, ceramics and glass, plastics and polymers, and naturally occurring materials. Includes metallurgists and metallurgical engineers, ceramic engineers, and welding engineers.
description_nb: Vurderer materialer og utvikler maskineri og prosesser for å produsere materialer til bruk i produkter som må møte spesielle krav til utforming og ytelse. Utvikler nye bruksområder for kjente materialer. Inkluderer ingeniører som arbeider med komposittmaterialer eller er spesialist på en materialtype, som f.eks. grafitt, metall og metallegeringer, keramikk og glass, plast og polymerer og naturlig forekommende materialer. Inkluderer metallurger og metallurgisk ingeniører, keramisk ingeniør og sveiseingeniør.

title: Mechanical Engineers
description: Perform engineering duties in planning and designing tools, engines, machines, and other mechanically functioning equipment. Oversee installation, operation, maintenance, and repair of equipment such as centralized heat, gas, water, and steam systems.
description_nb: Utfører ingeniøroppgaver ved planlegging og utforming av verktøy, motorer, maskiner og annet mekanisk utstyr. Leder installasjon, drift, vedlikehold og reparasjon av utstyr så som sentralvarme-, -gass-, -vann- og -dampsystemer.

title: Fuel Cell Engineers
description: Design, evaluate, modify, or construct fuel cell components or systems for transportation, stationary, or portable applications.
description_nb: Utformer, evaluerer, tilpasser eller konstruerer brenselcellekomponenter eller -systemer til transport, eller til stasjonære eller mobile bruksområder.

title: Automotive Engineers
description: Develop new or improved designs for vehicle structural members, engines, transmissions, or other vehicle systems, using computer-assisted design technology. Direct building, modification, or testing of vehicle or components.
description_nb: Utvikler nye eller forbedrede løsninger for komponenter, motorer, transmisjoner eller andre kjøretøysystemer, ved bruk av datamaskinassistert designteknologi. Styrer bygging, modifisering eller testing av kjøretøy eller komponenter.

title: Mining and Geological Engineers, Including Mining Safety Engineers
description: Conduct sub-surface surveys to identify the characteristics of potential land or mining development sites. May specify the ground support systems, processes and equipment for safe, economical, and environmentally sound extraction or underground construction activities. May inspect areas for unsafe geological conditions, equipment, and working conditions. May design, implement, and coordinate mine safety programs.
description_nb: Utfører underjordiske undersøkelser for å fastslå egenskaper ved potensielle områder for landutvikling eller gruvedrift. Kan gi nærmere beskrivelser av bakkestøtte, framgangsmåter og utstyr til trygg, økonomisk og miljøvennlig utvinning eller underjordisk byggevirksomhet. Kan undersøke områder for utrygge geologiske vilkår, utstyr og arbeidsforhold. Kan utforme, iverksette og samordne gruvesikkerhetstiltak.

title: Nuclear Engineers
description: Conduct research on nuclear engineering projects or apply principles and theory of nuclear science to problems concerned with release, control, and use of nuclear energy and nuclear waste disposal.
description_nb: Gjennomfører forskning på prosjekter innen kjerneteknikk eller bruker prinsipper og teori fra kjernefysikk på problemer som har å gjøre med frigjøring, kontroll og bruk av kjernekraft og håndtering av atomavfall.

title: Petroleum Engineers
description: Devise methods to improve oil and gas extraction and production and determine the need for new or modified tool designs. Oversee drilling and offer technical advice.
description_nb: Tenker ut metoder for å forbedre olje- og gassutvinning og -produksjon og fastslå behovet for nye eller modifiserte verktøy. Leder boring og gir tekniske råd.

title: Engineers, All Other
description: All engineers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle ingeniøryrker som ikke er oppført separat.

title: Energy Engineers, Except Wind and Solar
