title_nb: Underviser i fremmedspråk og fremmedspråklig litteratur, høyere utdanning
description: Teach languages and literature courses in languages other than English. Includes teachers of American Sign Language (ASL). Includes both teachers primarily engaged in teaching and those who do a combination of teaching and research.
description_nb: Holder studieemner om språk og litteratur på andre språk enn norsk. Inkluderer undervisere i norsk tegnspråk. Omfatter både undervisere som i hovedsak driver opplæring, og de som både underviser og forsker.

title: History Teachers, Postsecondary
description: Teach courses in human history and historiography. Includes both teachers primarily engaged in teaching and those who do a combination of teaching and research.
description_nb: Holder studieemner om menneskets historie og historiografi. Omfatter både undervisere som i hovedsak driver opplæring, og de som både underviser og forsker.

title: Philosophy and Religion Teachers, Postsecondary
title_nb: Underviser i filosofi og religion, høyere utdanning
description: Teach courses in philosophy, religion, and theology. Includes both teachers primarily engaged in teaching and those who do a combination of teaching and research.
description_nb: Holder studieemner i filosofi, religion og teologi. Omfatter både undervisere som i hovedsak driver opplæring, og de som både underviser og forsker.

title: Family and Consumer Sciences Teachers, Postsecondary
description: Teach courses in childcare, family relations, finance, nutrition, and related subjects pertaining to home management. Includes both teachers primarily engaged in teaching and those who do a combination of teaching and research.
description_nb: Holder studieemner i barnepleie, familierelasjoner, økonomi, ernæring og beslektete emner som angår husholdning. Omfatter både undervisere som i hovedsak driver opplæring, og de som både underviser og forsker.

title: Recreation and Fitness Studies Teachers, Postsecondary
title_nb: Underviser i fritidsstudier og fitness-studier, høyere utdanning
description: Teach courses pertaining to recreation, leisure, and fitness studies, including exercise physiology and facilities management. Includes both teachers primarily engaged in teaching and those who do a combination of teaching and research.
description_nb: Holder studieemner som angår rekreasjons-, fritids- og fitness-studier, inkludert treningsfysiologi og anleggsledelse. Omfatter både undervisere som i hovedsak driver opplæring, og de som både underviser og forsker.

title: Career/Technical Education Teachers, Postsecondary
description: Teach or instruct vocational or occupational subjects at the postsecondary level (but at less than the baccalaureate) to students who have graduated or left high school. Includes correspondence school, industrial, and commercial instructors; and adult education teachers and instructors who prepare persons to operate industrial machinery and equipment and transportation and communications equipment. Teaching may take place in public or private schools whose primary business is education or in a school associated with an organization whose primary business is other than education.
description_nb: Underviser eller veileder i emner innen yrkesfag eller jobbrelaterte emner på høyere utdanningsnivå (men lavere enn baccalaureate) for studenter som er ferdige eller har sluttet på videregående skole. Omfatter undervisere ved nettstudier, industrielle og kommersielle veiledere, og undervisere ved voksenopplæring og instruktører som setter folk i stand til å styre industrielt maskineri og utstyr og transport- og kommunikasjonsutstyr. Undervisningen kan finne sted ved offentlige eller private skoler som primært driver utdanning, eller ved en skole tilknyttet en organisasjon som primært driver med annet enn utdanning.

title: Postsecondary Teachers, All Other
title_nb: Undervisere ved høyere utdanning, alle andre
description: All postsecondary teachers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle som underviser ved høyere utdanning, som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Preschool Teachers, Except Special Education
description: Instruct preschool-aged children in activities designed to promote social, physical, and intellectual growth needed for primary school in preschool, day care center, or other child development facility. May be required to hold State certification.
description_nb: Veileder barn i førskolealder i aktiviteter som skal fremme sosial, fysisk og intellektuell vekst som trengs i skolegangen, i førskole, barnehage eller andre barnepassordninger. Kan bli krevet offentlig sertifisering.

title: Kindergarten Teachers, Except Special Education
description: Teach elemental natural and social science, personal hygiene, music, art, and literature to kindergarten students. Promote physical, mental, and social development. May be required to hold State certification.
description_nb: Underviser i grunnleggende realfag og samfunnsfag, personlig hygiene, musikk, kunst og litteratur til barnehagebarn. Fremmer fysisk, mental og sosial utvikling. Kan bli krevet offentlig sertifisering.

title: Elementary School Teachers, Except Special Education
description: Teach students basic academic, social, and other formative skills in public or private schools at the elementary level.
description_nb: Underviser elever i grunnleggende teoretiske, sosiale og andre grunnleggende ferdigheter ved offentlige eller private skoler på barneskolenivå.

title: Middle School Teachers, Except Special and Career/Technical Education
title_nb: Grunnskolelærer på mellomtrinnet og ungdomstrinnet, utenom spesialundervisning og yrkesfag og tekniske fag
description: Teach students in one or more subjects in public or private schools at the middle, intermediate, or junior high level, which falls between elementary and senior high school as defined by applicable laws and regulations.
description_nb: Underviser elever i ett eller flere fag ved offentlige eller private skoler på mellomtrinnet eller ungdomsskolen.

title: Career/Technical Education Teachers, Middle School
title_nb: Lærer på yrkesfag og tekniske fag, ungdomstrinnet
description: Teach occupational, career and technical, or vocational subjects in public or private schools at the middle, intermediate, or junior high level, which falls between elementary and senior high school as defined by applicable laws and regulations.
description_nb: Underviser i yrkesrettede, karriererettede og tekniske fag eller yrkesfaglige emner ved offentlige eller private skoler på ungdomstrinnet.

title: Secondary School Teachers, Except Special and Career/Technical Education
title_nb: Lærer ved videregående skole, utenom spesialundervisning og yrkesfag og tekniske fag
description: Teach students in one or more subjects, such as English, mathematics, or social studies at the secondary level in public or private schools. May be designated according to subject matter specialty.
description_nb: Underviser elever i ett eller flere fag, som norsk, matte eller samfunnsfag, på videregående nivå i offentlige eller private skoler. Kan spesialisere seg innen et bestemt fag.

title: Career/Technical Education Teachers, Secondary School
title_nb: Lærer på yrkesfag og tekniske fag, videregående skole
description: Teach occupational, career and technical, or vocational subjects at the secondary school level in public or private schools.
description_nb: Underviser i yrkesfag og tekniske fag på videregående nivå ved offentlige eller private skoler.

title: Special Education Teachers, Preschool
description: Teach preschool school subjects to educationally and physically handicapped students. Includes teachers who specialize and work with audibly and visually handicapped students and those who teach basic academic and life processes skills to the mentally impaired.
description_nb: Lærer skolefag til barn med utviklings- eller funksjonshemninger. Inkluderer lærere som har spesialisert seg på og jobber med barn med hørsels- eller synsnedsettelse, og de som lærer grunnleggende faglige ferdigheter og livsferdigheter til mentalt svekkede.

title: Special Education Teachers, Kindergarten
description: Teach academic, social, and life skills to kindergarten students with learning, emotional, or physical disabilities. Includes teachers who specialize and work with students who are blind or have visual impairments; students who are deaf or have hearing impairments; and students with intellectual disabilities.

title: Special Education Teachers, Elementary School
description: Teach academic, social, and life skills to elementary school students with learning, emotional, or physical disabilities. Includes teachers who specialize and work with students who are blind or have visual impairments; students who are deaf or have hearing impairments; and students with intellectual disabilities.

title: Special Education Teachers, Middle School
description: Teach academic, social, and life skills to middle school students with learning, emotional, or physical disabilities. Includes teachers who specialize and work with students who are blind or have visual impairments; students who are deaf or have hearing impairments; and students with intellectual disabilities.

title: Special Education Teachers, Secondary School
description: Teach academic, social, and life skills to secondary school students with learning, emotional, or physical disabilities. Includes teachers who specialize and work with students who are blind or have visual impairments; students who are deaf or have hearing impairments; and students with intellectual disabilities.

title: Special Education Teachers, All Other
description: All special education teachers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle spesialpedagoger som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Adapted Physical Education Specialists
description: Provide individualized physical education instruction or services to children, youth, or adults with exceptional physical needs due to gross motor developmental delays or other impairments.
description_nb: Gir veiledning eller tjenester innen tilrettelagt kroppsøving til barn, unge eller voksne med særskilte fysiske behov grunnet omfattende motorisk utviklingsforsinkelse eller andre svekkelser.

title: Adult Basic Education, Adult Secondary Education, and English as a Second Language Instructors
title_nb: Lærere og leseveiledere ved grunnopplæring og videregående opplæring for voksne
description: Teach or instruct out-of-school youths and adults in remedial education classes, preparatory classes for the General Educational Development test, literacy, or English as a Second Language. Teaching may or may not take place in a traditional educational institution.
description_nb: Underviser eller veileder voksne og elever som har droppet ut av skolen, med støtteundervisning eller forberedende kurs til opptaksprøver, leseprøver eller norsk som fremmedspråk. Undervisningen kan, men må ikke foregå ved en konvensjonell utdanningsinstitusjon.

title: Self-Enrichment Teachers
description: Teach or instruct courses other than those that normally lead to an occupational objective or degree. Courses may include self-improvement, nonvocational, and nonacademic subjects. Teaching may or may not take place in a traditional educational institution.
description_nb: Underviser eller veileder i andre fag enn dem som vanligvis fører til en yrkesfaglig utdanning eller grad. Studieemner kan inkludere selvutvikling og fag som ikke er yrkesfaglige eller akademiske. Undervisningen kan, men må ikke foregå ved en konvensjonell utdanningsinstitusjon.

title: Substitute Teachers, Short-Term
description: Teach students on a short-term basis as a temporary replacement for a regular classroom teacher, typically using the regular teacher's lesson plan.

title: Tutors
description: Instruct individual students or small groups of students in academic subjects to support formal class instruction or to prepare students for standardized or admissions tests.

title: Teachers and Instructors, All Other
description: All teachers and instructors not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle lærere og veiledere som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Archivists
description: Appraise, edit, and direct safekeeping of permanent records and historically valuable documents. Participate in research activities based on archival materials.
description_nb: Gransker, redigerer og leder forvaring av trykte nedtegnelser og dokumenter av historisk verdi. Driver forskningsvirksomhet basert på arkivmateriale.

title: Curators
description: Administer collections, such as artwork, collectibles, historic items, or scientific specimens of museums or other institutions. May conduct instructional, research, or public service activities of institution.
description_nb: Administrerer samlinger, av f.eks. kunst, samlegjenstander, historiske gjenstander eller vitenskapelige spesimen for museer eller andre institusjoner. Kan ha oppgaver innen veiledning, forskning eller publikumstjenester ved institusjonen.

title: Museum Technicians and Conservators
description: Restore, maintain, or prepare objects in museum collections for storage, research, or exhibit. May work with specimens such as fossils, skeletal parts, or botanicals; or artifacts, textiles, or art. May identify and record objects or install and arrange them in exhibits. Includes book or document conservators.
description_nb: Restaurerer, vedlikeholder eller klargjør gjenstander i museumssamlinger for lagring, forskning eller utstilling. Kan jobbe med eksemplarer som fossiler, skjelettdeler eller botaniske eksemplarer; eller artefakter, tekstiler eller kunst. Kan registrere og bokføre gjenstander eller installere og stille dem opp til utstilling. Inkluderer bok- eller dokumentkonservatorer.

title: Librarians and Media Collections Specialists
description: Administer and maintain libraries or collections of information, for public or private access through reference or borrowing. Work in a variety of settings, such as educational institutions, museums, and corporations, and with various types of informational materials, such as books, periodicals, recordings, films, and databases. Tasks may include acquiring, cataloging, and circulating library materials, and user services such as locating and organizing information, providing instruction on how to access information, and setting up and operating a library's media equipment.

title: Library Technicians
description: Assist librarians by helping readers in the use of library catalogs, databases, and indexes to locate books and other materials; and by answering questions that require only brief consultation of standard reference. Compile records; sort and shelve books or other media; remove or repair damaged books or other media; register patrons; and check materials in and out of the circulation process. Replace materials in shelving area (stacks) or files. Includes bookmobile drivers who assist with providing services in mobile libraries.
description_nb: Bistår bibliotekarer ved å hjelpe lesere med å bruke bibliotekets kataloger, databaser og indekser for å finne bøker og annet materiale; og ved å svare på spørsmål som kun krever rask konsultasjon med standardreferanser. Samler materiale; sorterer og setter bøker og annet materiale i hyller; fjerner eller reparerer skadde bøker eller annet materiale; registrerer besøkende; og sjekker materiale inn og ut av distribusjonsprosessen. Setter materiale tilbake i bokhyllene eller arkivskap. Inkluderer sjåfører av bokbusser som bistår i å tilby tjenester for mobile biblioteker.

title: Farm and Home Management Educators
description: Advise, instruct, and assist individuals and families engaged in agriculture, agricultural-related processes, or home economics activities. Demonstrate procedures and apply research findings to solve problems; and instruct and train in product development, sales, and the use of machinery and equipment to promote general welfare. Includes county agricultural agents, feed and farm management advisors, home economists, and extension service advisors.
description_nb: Gir råd, veileder og bistår enkeltpersoner og familier som driver med landbruk, landbruksrelaterte prosesser eller husholdning. Demonstrerer prosedyrer og benytter vitenskapelige funn til å løse problemer; og veileder og gir opplæring i produktutvikling, salg og bruk av maskineri og utstyr for å fremme velferd generelt. Inkluderer kommunale landbrukskonsulenter, rådgivere innen fôring og gårdsforvaltning, husholdningsøkonomer og landbruksrådgivere.

title: Instructional Coordinators
description: Develop instructional material, coordinate educational content, and incorporate current technology in specialized fields that provide guidelines to educators and instructors for developing curricula and conducting courses. Includes educational consultants and specialists, and instructional material directors.
description_nb: Utvikler opplæringsmateriale, samordner undervisningsinnhold og inkorporerer moderne teknologi innen spesialiserte områder som gir retningslinjer til undervisere og veiledere, for å utvikle læreplaner og gjennomføre kurs. Inkluderer undervisningsrådgivere og -spesialister, og ledere for læremateriell.

title: Teaching Assistants, Preschool, Elementary, Middle, and Secondary School, Except Special Education
description: Assist a preschool, elementary, middle, or secondary school teacher with instructional duties. Serve in a position for which a teacher has primary responsibility for the design and implementation of educational programs and services.

title: Teaching Assistants, Special Education
description: Assist a preschool, elementary, middle, or secondary school teacher to provide academic, social, or life skills to students who have learning, emotional, or physical disabilities. Serve in a position for which a teacher has primary responsibility for the design and implementation of educational programs and services.

title: Teaching Assistants, Postsecondary
description: Assist faculty or other instructional staff in postsecondary institutions by performing instructional support activities, such as developing teaching materials, leading discussion groups, preparing and giving examinations, and grading examinations or papers.

title: Teaching Assistants, All Other
description: All teaching assistants not listed separately.

title: Educational Instruction and Library Workers, All Other
title_nb: Ansatte innen utdanning, opplæring og bibliotek, alle andre
description: All education, training, and library workers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle ansatte innen utdanning, opplæring og bibliotek som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Art Directors
description: Formulate design concepts and presentation approaches for visual communications media, such as print, broadcasting, and advertising. Direct workers engaged in art work or layout design.
description_nb: Utformer designkonsepter og tilnærminger for å presentere visuell kommunikasjonsmedier, som f.eks. trykk, kringkasting og reklame. Leder ansatte som jobber med kunst- eller layoutdesign.

title: Craft Artists
description: Create or reproduce hand-made objects for sale and exhibition using a variety of techniques, such as welding, weaving, pottery, and needlecraft.
description_nb: Lager eller reproduserer håndlagde gjenstander til å selges eller stille ut ved å bruke en rekke teknikker, som sveising, veving, keramikk og søm.

title: Fine Artists, Including Painters, Sculptors, and Illustrators
title_nb: Kunstner, inkludert maler, skulptør og illustratør
description: Create original artwork using any of a wide variety of media and techniques.
description_nb: Lager originale kunstverk ved å bruke hva som helst av en rekke materialer og teknikker.

title: Special Effects Artists and Animators
description: Create special effects, animation, or other visual images using film, video, computers, or other electronic tools and media for use in products or creations, such as computer games, movies, music videos, and commercials.
description_nb: Lager spesialeffekter, animasjoner eller andre visuelle bilder ved å bruke film, video, datamaskin eller andre elektroniske verktøy og media til bruk i produkter eller verk, som dataspill, filmer, musikkvideoer og reklamer.

title: Artists and Related Workers, All Other
title_nb: Kunstnere og beslektede yrker, alle andre
description: All artists and related workers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle kunstnere og beslektede yrker som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Commercial and Industrial Designers
description: Develop and design manufactured products, such as cars, home appliances, and children's toys. Combine artistic talent with research on product use, marketing, and materials to create the most functional and appealing product design.
description_nb: Utvikler og designer fabrikkframstilte produkter som biler, husholdningsapparater og barneleker. Kombinerer kunstnerisk talent med forskning på produktbruk, markedsføring og materialbruk for å skape det mest funksjonelle og tiltalende produktdesignet.

title: Fashion Designers
description: Design clothing and accessories. Create original designs or adapt fashion trends.
description_nb: Designer klær og tilbehør. Lager originale design eller adaptere motetrender.

title: Floral Designers
description: Design, cut, and arrange live, dried, or artificial flowers and foliage.
description_nb: Utformer, skjærer til og arrangerer friske, tørkede eller kunstige blomster og bladverk.

title: Graphic Designers
description: Design or create graphics to meet specific commercial or promotional needs, such as packaging, displays, or logos. May use a variety of mediums to achieve artistic or decorative effects.
description_nb: Designer eller utformer grafikk etter kommersielle eller salgsfremmende behov, som emballasje, fremvisninger eller logoer. Kan nyttegjøre seg av en rekke materialer for å oppnå kunstneriske eller dekorative effekter.

title: Interior Designers
description: Plan, design, and furnish interiors of residential, commercial, or industrial buildings. Formulate design which is practical, aesthetic, and conducive to intended purposes, such as raising productivity, selling merchandise, or improving life style. May specialize in a particular field, style, or phase of interior design.
description_nb: Planlegger, designer og innreder innvendig i bolig-, forretnings- eller industribygg. Utformer design som er praktisk, dekorativt og møter tiltenkt formål, som å øke produktivitet, selge varer eller forbedre hverdagen. Kan spesialisere seg på bestemte fagfelt, stiler eller faser i interiørdesign.

title: Merchandise Displayers and Window Trimmers
description: Plan and erect commercial displays, such as those in windows and interiors of retail stores and at trade exhibitions.
description_nb: Planlegger og setter opp produktframvisninger, som i butikkvinduer og butikklokaler og på varemesser.

title: Set and Exhibit Designers
description: Design special exhibits and movie, television, and theater sets. May study scripts, confer with directors, and conduct research to determine appropriate architectural styles.
description_nb: Designer spesielle utstillinger og film-, TV- og teaterscener. Kan granske manuskripter, samrå med regissører og gjøre undersøkelser for å finne fram til passende arkitektoniske stiler.

title: Designers, All Other
description: All designers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle designere som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Actors
description: Play parts in stage, television, radio, video, motion picture productions, or other settings for entertainment, information, or instruction. Interpret serious or comic role by speech, gesture, and body movement to entertain or inform audience. May dance and sing.
description_nb: Spiller roller i scene-, TV-, radio-, film- eller spillefilmproduksjoner, eller i andre sammenhenger for å underholde, informere eller instruere. Framfører alvorlige eller komiske roller med stemmebruk, gestikulasjon og kroppsspråk for å underholde eller underviser publikum. Kan måtte danse og synge.

title: Producers and Directors
description: Produce or direct stage, television, radio, video, or motion picture productions for entertainment, information, or instruction. Responsible for creative decisions, such as interpretation of script, choice of actors or guests, set design, sound, special effects, and choreography.
description_nb: Produserer eller regisserer scene-, TV-, radio-, film- eller spillefilmproduksjoner til underholdning, informasjon eller opplæring. Er beslutningsansvarlige for det kreative, som hvordan manus skal tolkes, valg av skuespillere eller gjester, scenografi, lyd, spesialeffekter og koreografi.

title: Media Programming Directors
description: Direct and coordinate activities of personnel engaged in preparation of radio or television station program schedules and programs, such as sports or news.
description_nb: Regisserer og koordinerer virksomheten til personale som jobber med å forberede radio- eller TV-programmer eller programposter som sport eller nyheter.

title: Talent Directors
description: Audition and interview performers to select most appropriate talent for parts in stage, television, radio, or motion picture productions.
description_nb: Holder audition og intervjuer skuespillere for å velge ut de best egnede talentene til scene-, TV-, radio- eller filmproduksjon.

title: Media Technical Directors/Managers
description: Coordinate activities of technical departments, such as taping, editing, engineering, and maintenance, to produce radio or television programs.
description_nb: Samordner arbeidet i tekniske avdelinger, som opptak, redigering, bygging og vedlikehold, for å produsere radio- eller TV-programmer.

title: Athletes and Sports Competitors
description: Compete in athletic events.
description_nb: Konkurrerer i sport og idrett.

title: Coaches and Scouts
description: Instruct or coach groups or individuals in the fundamentals of sports. Demonstrate techniques and methods of participation. May evaluate athletes' strengths and weaknesses as possible recruits or to improve the athletes' technique to prepare them for competition. Those required to hold teaching degrees should be reported in the appropriate teaching category.
description_nb: Instruerer eller trener grupper eller enkeltpersoner i det grunnleggende i sporten/idretten. Demonstrerer teknikker og måter å delta på. Kan vurdere utøveres styrker og svakheter som potensielle rekrutter eller for å forbedre utøvernes teknikk for å forberede dem til konkurranser. De som må være utdannede undervisere, må føres opp i rett underviserkategori.

title: Umpires, Referees, and Other Sports Officials
description: Officiate at competitive athletic or sporting events. Detect infractions of rules and decide penalties according to established regulations. Includes all sporting officials, referees, and competition judges.
description_nb: Jobber som funksjonær på idretts- eller sportsarrangementer. Oppdager regelbrudd og fastslår straff i henhold til fastsatte regler. Omfatter alle funksjonærer, dommere og konkurransedommere

title: Dancers
description: Perform dances. May perform on stage, for on-air broadcasting, or for video recording.
description_nb: Framfører dans. Kan opptre på scene, til direktesendinger eller til filminnspillinger.

title: Choreographers
description: Create new dance routines. Rehearse performance of routines. May direct and stage presentations.
description_nb: Lager nye dansenumre. Øver på framføring av numre. Kan regissere og oppføre framvisninger.

title: Music Directors and Composers
description: Conduct, direct, plan, and lead instrumental or vocal performances by musical groups, such as orchestras, bands, choirs, and glee clubs. Includes arrangers, composers, choral directors, and orchestrators.
description_nb: Dirigerer, styrer, planlegger og leder musikk- og sangopptredener av grupper med musikere, som orkestre, band, kor og acapellakor. Inkluderer arrangører, komponister, kordirigenter og orkesterledere.

title: Musicians and Singers
description: Play one or more musical instruments or sing. May perform on stage, for on-air broadcasting, or for sound or video recording.
description_nb: Spiller ett eller flere instrumenter eller synger. Kan opptre på scene, til direktesendinger eller til lyd- eller filminnspillinger.

title: Disc Jockeys, Except Radio
description: Play prerecorded music for live audiences at venues or events such as clubs, parties, or wedding receptions. May use techniques such as mixing, cutting, or sampling to manipulate recordings. May also perform as emcee (master of ceremonies).

title: Entertainers and Performers, Sports and Related Workers, All Other
title_nb: Underholdere og utøvere, arbeidere innen sport og liknende, alle andre
description: All entertainers and performers, sports and related workers not listed separately.
description_nb: Underholdere og utøvere, arbeidere innen sport og liknende som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Broadcast Announcers and Radio Disc Jockeys
description: Speak or read from scripted materials, such as news reports or commercial messages, on radio or television. May announce artist or title of performance, identify station, or interview guests.
description_nb: Snakker eller leser opp et manus, som nyhetsmeldinger eller reklamemeldinger, på radio eller TV. Kan presentere artist eller tittelen på verket, presentere stasjonen eller intervjue gjester.

title: News Analysts, Reporters, and Journalists
description: Narrate or write news stories, reviews, or commentary for print, broadcast, or other communications media such as newspapers, magazines, radio, or television. May collect and analyze information through interview, investigation, or observation.

title: Public Relations Specialists
description: Engage in promoting or creating an intended public image for individuals, groups, or organizations. May write or select material for release to various communications media.
description_nb: Promoterer eller skaper et ønsket offentlig image for personer, grupper eller organisasjoner. Kan skrive eller velge ut materiale som skal slippes til forskjellige kommunikasjonsmedier.

title: Editors
description: Plan, coordinate, or edit content of material for publication. May review proposals and drafts for possible publication. Includes technical editors.
description_nb: Planlegger, samordner eller redigerer innholdet i materiale som skal publiseres. Kan gjennomgå forslag eller utkast for å se om det kan utgis. Omfatter tekniske redaktører.

title: Technical Writers
description: Write technical materials, such as equipment manuals, appendices, or operating and maintenance instructions. May assist in layout work.
description_nb: Skriver teknisk materiale, som bruksanvisning til utstyr, pakningsvedlegg eller drifts- og vedlikeholdsinstruksjoner. Kan hjelpe til med layout.

title: Writers and Authors
description: Originate and prepare written material, such as scripts, stories, advertisements, and other material.
description_nb: Skaper og bearbeider skriftlig materiale, som manuskripter, fortellinger, reklametekster og annet materiale.

title: Poets, Lyricists and Creative Writers
description: Create original written works, such as scripts, essays, prose, poetry or song lyrics, for publication or performance.
description_nb: Skaper originalt skriftlig materiale, som manus, essay, prosa, poesi eller sanglyrikk til publisering eller framføring.

title: Interpreters and Translators
description: Interpret oral or sign language, or translate written text from one language into another.
description_nb: Tolker tale- eller tegnspråk eller oversetter skriftlig tekst fra ett språk til et annet.

title: Court Reporters and Simultaneous Captioners
description: Use verbatim methods and equipment to capture, store, retrieve, and transcribe pretrial and trial proceedings or other information. Includes stenocaptioners who operate computerized stenographic captioning equipment to provide captions of live or prerecorded broadcasts for hearing-impaired viewers.

title: Media and Communication Workers, All Other
title_nb: Ansatt innen media og kommunikasjon, alle andre
description: All media and communication workers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle ansatte innen media og kommunikasjon som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Audio and Video Technicians
description: Set up, or set up and operate audio and video equipment including microphones, sound speakers, video screens, projectors, video monitors, recording equipment, connecting wires and cables, sound and mixing boards, and related electronic equipment for concerts, sports events, meetings and conventions, presentations, and news conferences. May also set up and operate associated spotlights and other custom lighting systems.
description_nb: Setter opp eller setter opp og drifter lyd- og videoutstyr, inkludert mikrofoner, høyttalere, videoskjermer, projektorer, monitorer, opptaksutstyr, kobler ledninger og kabler, lyd- og miksebord og tilhørende utstyr til konserter, sportsarrangementer, møter og messer, presentasjoner og pressekonferanser. Kan også sette opp og drifte tilknyttede spotlys og andre spesialtilpassede lysanlegg.

title: Broadcast Technicians
description: Set up, operate, and maintain the electronic equipment used to transmit radio and television programs. Control audio equipment to regulate volume level and quality of sound during radio and television broadcasts. Operate transmitter to broadcast radio or television programs.
description_nb: Setter opp, drifter og vedlikeholder elektronisk utstyr brukt til å sende radio- og TV-programmer. Styrer lydutstyr for å endre lydnivå og lydkvalitet under radio- og TV-sendinger. Drifter senderapparater for å kringkaste radio- eller TV-programmer.

title: Sound Engineering Technicians
description: Operate machines and equipment to record, synchronize, mix, or reproduce music, voices, or sound effects in sporting arenas, theater productions, recording studios, or movie and video productions.
description_nb: Opererer maskiner og utstyr for å ta opp, synkronisere, mikse eller gjenkalle musikk, stemmer eller lydeffekter på idrettsarenaer, teaterproduksjoner, opptaksstudio eller film- og videoproduksjon.

title: Lighting Technicians
description: Set up, maintain, and dismantle light fixtures, lighting control devices, and the associated lighting electrical and rigging equipment used for photography, television, film, video, and live productions. May focus or operate light fixtures, or attach color filters or other lighting accessories.

title: Photographers
description: Photograph people, landscapes, merchandise, or other subjects, using digital or film cameras and equipment. May develop negatives or use computer software to produce finished images and prints. Includes scientific photographers, aerial photographers, and photojournalists.
description_nb: Fotograferer mennesker, landskap, varer eller andre gjenstander ved bruk av digitale eller analoge kameraer og utstyr. Kan fremkalle negativer eller bruke programvare for å ferdigstille bilder og trykk. Inkluderer vitenskapelige fotografer, luftfotografer og fotojournalister.

title: Camera Operators, Television, Video, and Film
description: Operate television, video, or motion picture camera to record images or scenes for various purposes, such as TV broadcasts, advertising, video production, or motion pictures.
description_nb: Styrer TV-, video- eller filmkameraer for å ta bilder eller spille inn scener til ulike formål, som TV-sendinger, reklame, videoproduksjon eller filminnspilling.

title: Film and Video Editors
description: Edit moving images on film, video, or other media. May edit or synchronize soundtracks with images.
description_nb: Redigerer bevegelige bilder på film, video eller annet materiale. Kan klippe eller synkronisere lydspor med bilder.

title: Media and Communication Equipment Workers, All Other
title_nb: Utstyrsteknikere innen media og kommunikasjon, alle andre
description: All media and communication equipment workers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle som jobber med utstyr innen media og kommunikasjon som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Chiropractors
description: Assess, treat, and care for patients by manipulation of spine and musculoskeletal system. May provide spinal adjustment or address sacral or pelvic misalignment.
description_nb: Vurderer, behandler og pleier pasienter ved å manipulere ryggsøylen og muskel- og skjelettsystemet. Kan tilby justering av ryggsøylen eller forskyvninger i korsbein eller bekken.

title: Dentists, General
description: Examine, diagnose, and treat diseases, injuries, and malformations of teeth and gums. May treat diseases of nerve, pulp, and other dental tissues affecting oral hygiene and retention of teeth. May fit dental appliances or provide preventive care.
description_nb: Undersøker, diagnostiserer og behandler sykdommer, skader og misdannelser på tenner og gommer. Kan behandler sykdommer i nerver, pulpa eller andre tannvev som påvirker munnhygiene og retensjon av tenner. Kan justere kjeveortopedisk apparatur eller gi forebyggende pleie.

title: Oral and Maxillofacial Surgeons
description: Perform surgery and related procedures on the hard and soft tissues of the oral and maxillofacial regions to treat diseases, injuries, or defects. May diagnose problems of the oral and maxillofacial regions. May perform surgery to improve function or appearance.
description_nb: Utfører kirurgi og tilhørende prosedyrer i hardt og mykt vev i munn-, kjeve- og ansiktsregionen for å behandle sykdommer, skader eller defekter. Kan diagnostisere problemer i munnen og kjeve- og ansiktsregionen. Kan utføre kirurgi for å utbedre funksjon eller utseende.

title: Orthodontists
description: Examine, diagnose, and treat dental malocclusions and oral cavity anomalies. Design and fabricate appliances to realign teeth and jaws to produce and maintain normal function and to improve appearance.
description_nb: Undersøker, diagnostiserer og behandler malokklusjoner og uregelmessigheter i munnhulen. Utformer og produserer apparaturer for å rette opp tenner og kjever for å opprette og opprettholde normal funksjon og forbedre utseende.

title: Prosthodontists
description: Construct oral prostheses to replace missing teeth and other oral structures to correct natural and acquired deformation of mouth and jaws, to restore and maintain oral function, such as chewing and speaking, and to improve appearance.
description_nb: Lager dentalproteser for å erstatte manglende tenner eller andre munndeler for å korrigere medfødte og ervervede deformeringer i munnen og kjeven for å gjenopprette og opprettholde munnfunksjoner, som tygging og snakking, og å forbedre utseende.

title: Dentists, All Other Specialists
description: All dentists not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle tannleger som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Dietitians and Nutritionists
description: Plan and conduct food service or nutritional programs to assist in the promotion of health and control of disease. May supervise activities of a department providing quantity food services, counsel individuals, or conduct nutritional research.
description_nb: Planlegger og gjennomfører matplaner eller kostholdsprogram for å bistå i helsefremmende arbeid og sykdomskontroll. Kan føre tilsyn med driften i en avdeling som tilbyr storkjøkkentjenester, gi rådgivning til enkeltpersoner eller gjennomføre ernæringsundersøkelser.

title: Optometrists
description: Diagnose, manage, and treat conditions and diseases of the human eye and visual system. Examine eyes and visual system, diagnose problems or impairments, prescribe corrective lenses, and provide treatment. May prescribe therapeutic drugs to treat specific eye conditions.
description_nb: Diagnostiserer, pleier og behandler tilstander og sykdommer på øyet og synet. Undersøker øyne og syn, diagnostiserer problemer eller svekkelser, foreskrive korrektive linser og tilby behandling. Kan skrive ut resepter på terapeutiske medisiner for å behandle visse øyesykdommer.

title: Pharmacists
description: Dispense drugs prescribed by physicians and other health practitioners and provide information to patients about medications and their use. May advise physicians and other health practitioners on the selection, dosage, interactions, and side effects of medications.
description_nb: Dispenserer medisiner leger og annet helsepersonell har foreskrevet, og gir pasienter informasjon om medikamenter og bruken av dem. Kan gi råd til leger og annet helsepersonell om valg, dosering, vekselvirkning og bivirkninger av medikamenter.

title: Physician Assistants
description: Provide healthcare services typically performed by a physician, under the supervision of a physician. Conduct complete physicals, provide treatment, and counsel patients. May, in some cases, prescribe medication. Must graduate from an accredited educational program for physician assistants.
description_nb: Tilbyr helseverntjenester som typisk blir utført av en lege, under oppsyn av lege. Utfører helsesjekker, tilbyr behandling og rådgir pasienter. Kan i noen tilfeller foreskrive medikamenter. Må være uteksaminert ved et autorisert studieprogram for legeassistenter.

title: Anesthesiologist Assistants
description: Assist anesthesiologists in the administration of anesthesia for surgical and non-surgical procedures. Monitor patient status and provide patient care during surgical treatment.
description_nb: Bistår anestesileger i håndtering av narkose til kirurgiske og ikke-kirurgiske prosedyrer. Overvåker pasienttilstand og pleier pasienten under kirurgisk behandling.

title: Podiatrists
description: Diagnose and treat diseases and deformities of the human foot.
description_nb: Diagnostiserer og behandler sykdommer og misdannelser på foten.

title: Occupational Therapists
description: Assess, plan, organize, and participate in rehabilitative programs that help build or restore vocational, homemaking, and daily living skills, as well as general independence, to persons with disabilities or developmental delays.
description_nb: Vurderer, planlegger, organiserer og deltar i rehabiliterende programmer som hjelper med å bygge opp eller gjenopprette evne til arbeid, husarbeid og dagligliv, så vel som generell selvstendighet, for personer med funksjonshemninger eller utviklingsforsinkelser.

title: Low Vision Therapists, Orientation and Mobility Specialists, and Vision Rehabilitation Therapists
title_nb: Synsterapeut, orienterings- og mobilitetsterapeut og synsrehabiliteringsterapeut
description: Provide therapy to patients with visual impairments to improve their functioning in daily life activities. May train patients in activities such as computer use, communication skills, or home management skills.
description_nb: Tilbyr terapi til pasienter med synshemninger for å forbedre funksjonsevnen i dagligdagse aktiviteter. Kan øve pasienter i aktiviteter som bruk av datamaskin, kommunikasjonsevner eller husholdning.

title: Physical Therapists
description: Assess, plan, organize, and participate in rehabilitative programs that improve mobility, relieve pain, increase strength, and improve or correct disabling conditions resulting from disease or injury.
description_nb: Vurderer, planlegger, organiserer og deltar i rehabiliterende programmer for å forbedre mobilitet, lindre smerte, øke styrke og forbedre eller rette opp i invalidiserende tilstander som følge av sykdom eller skade.

title: Radiation Therapists
description: Provide radiation therapy to patients as prescribed by a radiologist according to established practices and standards. Duties may include reviewing prescription and diagnosis; acting as liaison with physician and supportive care personnel; preparing equipment, such as immobilization, treatment, and protection devices; and maintaining records, reports, and files. May assist in dosimetry procedures and tumor localization.
description_nb: Tilbyr stråleterapi til pasienter som foreskrevet av en radiolog i tråd med etablerte praksiser og standarder. Arbeidsoppgaver kan omfatte å gå gjennom medisiner og diagnoser; være kontaktperson med leger og støttepersonell; gjør klart utstyr, som utstyr til immobilisering, behandling og beskyttelse; og å vedlikeholde logger, rapporter og filer. Kan bistå i dosimetriprosedyrer og svultslokalisering.

title: Recreational Therapists
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate medically-approved recreation programs for patients in hospitals, nursing homes, or other institutions. Activities include sports, trips, dramatics, social activities, and arts and crafts. May assess a patient condition and recommend appropriate recreational activity.
description_nb: Planlegger, styrer eller samordner medisinsk godkjente rekreasjonsprogrammer for pasienter i sykehus, pleiehjem eller andre institusjoner. Aktiviteter inkluderer sport, turer, teateroppsetninger, sosiale aktiviteter og kunst og håndverk. Kan vurdere tilstander hos pasienter og anbefale passende rekreasjonsaktiviteter.

title: Respiratory Therapists
description: Assess, treat, and care for patients with breathing disorders. Assume primary responsibility for all respiratory care modalities, including the supervision of respiratory therapy technicians. Initiate and conduct therapeutic procedures; maintain patient records; and select, assemble, check, and operate equipment.
description_nb: Vurderer, behandler og pleier pasienter med åndedrettssykdommer. Tar på seg hovedansvaret for alle områder av åndedrettspleie, inkludert å føre tilsyn med teknikere innen åndedrettsterapi. Initierer og gjennomfører terapeutiske prosedyrer; fører pasientjournaler; og velger ut, setter sammen, kontrollerer og manøvrerer utstyr.

title: Speech-Language Pathologists
description: Assess and treat persons with speech, language, voice, and fluency disorders. May select alternative communication systems and teach their use. May perform research related to speech and language problems.
description_nb: Vurderer og behandler personer med tale-, språk-, stemme- og taleflytvansker. Kan velge ut alternative kommunikasjonssystemer og undervise i bruken av dem. Kan drive forskning i tilknytning til tale- og språkvansker.

title: Exercise Physiologists
description: Assess, plan, or implement fitness programs that include exercise or physical activities such as those designed to improve cardiorespiratory function, body composition, muscular strength, muscular endurance, or flexibility.
description_nb: Vurderer, planlegger eller implementerer treningsprogrammer som inkluderer trening eller fysisk aktivitet med formål å forbedre kardiorespiratoriske funksjoner, kroppssammensetning, muskelstyrke, muskelutholdenhet eller tøyelighet.

title: Therapists, All Other
description: All therapists not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle terapeuter som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Art Therapists
description: Plan or conduct art therapy sessions or programs to improve clients' physical, cognitive, or emotional well-being.

title: Music Therapists
description: Plan, organize, direct, or assess clinical and evidenced-based music therapy interventions to positively influence individuals' physical, psychological, cognitive, or behavioral status.

title: Veterinarians
description: Diagnose, treat, or research diseases and injuries of animals. Includes veterinarians who conduct research and development, inspect livestock, or care for pets and companion animals.
description_nb: Diagnostiserer, behandler eller forsker på sykdommer og skader hos dyr. Inkluderer veterinærer som driver med forskning og utvikling, inspiserer husdyr eller pleier kjæledyr og servicehunder.

title: Registered Nurses
description: Assess patient health problems and needs, develop and implement nursing care plans, and maintain medical records. Administer nursing care to ill, injured, convalescent, or disabled patients. May advise patients on health maintenance and disease prevention or provide case management. Licensing or registration required.
description_nb: Vurderer pasienters helseproblemer og behov, utformer og implementerer pleieopplegg og oppdaterer medisinske journaler. Gir pleie til syke, skadde, rekonvalesenter eller funksjonshemmede pasienter. Kan rådgi pasienter om opprettholdelse av helse og forebygging av sykdom eller tilbyr saksbehandling. Lisens eller autorisasjon er påkrevd.

title: Acute Care Nurses
description: Provide advanced nursing care for patients with acute conditions such as heart attacks, respiratory distress syndrome, or shock. May care for pre- and post-operative patients or perform advanced, invasive diagnostic or therapeutic procedures.
description_nb: Tilbyr avansert pleie for pasienter med akutte tilstander som hjerteinfarkt, akutt lungesviktsyndrom eller sjokk. Kan pleie pasienter før eller etter operasjon eller utføre avansert, invasiv diagnostikk eller terapeutiske prosedyrer.

title: Advanced Practice Psychiatric Nurses
description: Provide advanced nursing care for patients with psychiatric disorders. May provide psychotherapy under the direction of a psychiatrist.
description_nb: Tilbyr avansert pleiehjelp til pasienter med psykiatriske lidelser. Kan tilby psykoterapi under ledelse av en psykiater.

title: Critical Care Nurses
description: Provide advanced nursing care for patients in critical or coronary care units.
description_nb: Tilbyr avansert pleie for pasienter ved intensiv- eller hjerteavdelinger.

title: Clinical Nurse Specialists
description: Plan, direct, or coordinate the daily patient care activities in a clinical practice. Ensure adherence to established clinical policies, protocols, regulations, and standards.
description_nb: Planlegger, leder eller samordner daglig pasientpleie ved kliniske praksiser. Forsikrer at etablerte kliniske retningslinjer, protokoller, forskrifter og standarder blir fulgt.

title: Nurse Anesthetists
description: Administer anesthesia, monitor patient's vital signs, and oversee patient recovery from anesthesia. May assist anesthesiologists, surgeons, other physicians, or dentists. Must be registered nurses who have specialized graduate education.
description_nb: Håndterer narkose, overvåker pasienters vitale tegn og følger med på pasienter som kommer seg etter narkose. Kan bistå anestesileger, kirurger, andre leger eller tannleger. Må være autoriserte sykepleier med spesialisert høyere utdanning.

title: Nurse Midwives
description: Diagnose and coordinate all aspects of the birthing process, either independently or as part of a healthcare team. May provide well-woman gynecological care. Must have specialized, graduate nursing education.
description_nb: Diagnostiserer og samordner alle sider av fødselsprosessen, enten alene eller som del av et helseteam. Kan tilby gynekologisk behandling for kvinner. Må ha en spesialisert høyere sykepleieutdanning.

title: Nurse Practitioners
description: Diagnose and treat acute, episodic, or chronic illness, independently or as part of a healthcare team. May focus on health promotion and disease prevention. May order, perform, or interpret diagnostic tests such as lab work and x rays. May prescribe medication. Must be registered nurses who have specialized graduate education.
description_nb: Diagnostiserer og behandler akutte, episodiske eller kroniske sykdommer, alene eller som del av et helseteam. Kan fokusere på helsefremming og sykdomsforebygging. Kan bestille, utføre eller tolke diagnostiske tester som laboratoriearbeid eller røntgen. Kan foreskrive medikamenter. Må være autoriserte sykepleier med spesialisert høyere utdanning.

title: Audiologists
description: Assess and treat persons with hearing and related disorders. May fit hearing aids and provide auditory training. May perform research related to hearing problems.
description_nb: Vurderer og behandler personer med hørselslidelser og liknende. Kan justere høreapparater og tilby hørselstrening. Kan drive forskning på hørselsrelaterte problemstillinger.

title: Anesthesiologists
description: Administer anesthetics and analgesics for pain management prior to, during, or after surgery.

title: Cardiologists
description: Diagnose, treat, manage, and prevent diseases or conditions of the cardiovascular system. May further subspecialize in interventional procedures (e.g., balloon angioplasty and stent placement), echocardiography, or electrophysiology.

title: Dermatologists
description: Diagnose and treat diseases relating to the skin, hair, and nails. May perform both medical and dermatological surgery functions.

title: Emergency Medicine Physicians
description: Make immediate medical decisions and act to prevent death or further disability. Provide immediate recognition, evaluation, care, stabilization, and disposition of patients. May direct emergency medical staff in an emergency department.

title: Family Medicine Physicians
description: Diagnose, treat, and provide preventive care to individuals and families across the lifespan. May refer patients to specialists when needed for further diagnosis or treatment.

title: General Internal Medicine Physicians
description: Diagnose and provide nonsurgical treatment for a wide range of diseases and injuries of internal organ systems. Provide care mainly for adults and adolescents, and are based primarily in an outpatient care setting.

title: Neurologists
description: Diagnose, manage, and treat disorders and diseases of the brain, spinal cord, and peripheral nerves, with a primarily nonsurgical focus.

title: Obstetricians and Gynecologists
description: Provide medical care related to pregnancy or childbirth. Diagnose, treat, and help prevent diseases of women, particularly those affecting the reproductive system. May also provide general care to women. May perform both medical and gynecological surgery functions.

title: Pediatricians, General
description: Diagnose, treat, and help prevent diseases and injuries in children. May refer patients to specialists for further diagnosis or treatment, as needed.

title: Physicians, Pathologists
description: Diagnose diseases and conduct lab tests using organs, body tissues, and fluids. Includes medical examiners.

title: Psychiatrists
description: Diagnose, treat, and help prevent mental disorders.

title: Radiologists
description: Diagnose and treat diseases and injuries using medical imaging techniques, such as x rays, magnetic resonance imaging (MRI), nuclear medicine, and ultrasounds. May perform minimally invasive medical procedures and tests.

title: Physicians, All Other
description: All physicians not listed separately.

title: Allergists and Immunologists
description: Diagnose, treat, and help prevent allergic diseases and disease processes affecting the immune system.

title: Hospitalists
description: Provide inpatient care predominantly in settings such as medical wards, acute care units, intensive care units, rehabilitation centers, or emergency rooms. Manage and coordinate patient care throughout treatment.

title: Urologists
description: Diagnose, treat, and help prevent benign and malignant medical and surgical disorders of the genitourinary system and the renal glands.

title: Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation Physicians
description: Diagnose and treat disorders requiring physiotherapy to provide physical, mental, and occupational rehabilitation.

title: Preventive Medicine Physicians
description: Apply knowledge of general preventive medicine and public health issues to promote health care to groups or individuals, and aid in the prevention or reduction of risk of disease, injury, disability, or death. May practice population-based medicine or diagnose and treat patients in the context of clinical health promotion and disease prevention.

title: Sports Medicine Physicians
description: Diagnose, treat, and help prevent injuries that occur during sporting events, athletic training, and physical activities.

title: Ophthalmologists, Except Pediatric
description: Diagnose and perform surgery to treat and help prevent disorders and diseases of the eye. May also provide vision services for treatment including glasses and contacts.

title: Orthopedic Surgeons, Except Pediatric
description: Diagnose and perform surgery to treat and prevent rheumatic and other diseases in the musculoskeletal system.

title: Pediatric Surgeons
description: Diagnose and perform surgery to treat fetal abnormalities and birth defects, diseases, and injuries in fetuses, premature and newborn infants, children, and adolescents. Includes all pediatric surgical specialties and subspecialties.

title: Surgeons, All Other
description: All surgeons not listed separately.

title: Acupuncturists
description: Diagnose, treat, and prevent disorders by stimulating specific acupuncture points within the body using acupuncture needles. May also use cups, nutritional supplements, therapeutic massage, acupressure, and other alternative health therapies.

title: Dental Hygienists
description: Administer oral hygiene care to patients. Assess patient oral hygiene problems or needs and maintain health records. Advise patients on oral health maintenance and disease prevention. May provide advanced care such as providing fluoride treatment or administering topical anesthesia.

title: Healthcare Diagnosing or Treating Practitioners, All Other
description: All healthcare diagnosing or treating practitioners not listed separately.

title: Naturopathic Physicians
description: Diagnose, treat, and help prevent diseases using a system of practice that is based on the natural healing capacity of individuals. May use physiological, psychological or mechanical methods. May also use natural medicines, prescription or legend drugs, foods, herbs, or other natural remedies.

title: Orthoptists
description: Diagnose and treat visual system disorders such as binocular vision and eye movement impairments.

title: Medical and Clinical Laboratory Technologists
description: Perform complex medical laboratory tests for diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease. May train or supervise staff.
description_nb: Utfører komplekse laboratorietester for å diagnostisere, behandle og forebygge sykdom. Kan lære opp eller veilede personale.

title: Cytogenetic Technologists
description: Analyze chromosomes found in biological specimens such as amniotic fluids, bone marrow, and blood to aid in the study, diagnosis, or treatment of genetic diseases.
description_nb: Analyserer kromosomer funnet i biologiske prøver som fostervann, beinmarg og blod for å bistå i studier, diagnostisering eller behandling av genetiske sykdommer.

title: Cytotechnologists
description: Stain, mount, and study cells to detect evidence of cancer, hormonal abnormalities, and other pathological conditions following established standards and practices.
description_nb: Farger, monterer og studerer celler for å oppdage tegn på kreft, hormonelle avvik og andre patologiske tilstander ved å følge etablerte standarder og praksiser.

title: Histotechnologists
description: Apply knowledge of health and disease causes to evaluate new laboratory techniques and procedures to examine tissue samples. Process and prepare histological slides from tissue sections for microscopic examination and diagnosis by pathologists. May solve technical or instrument problems or assist with research studies.

title: Medical and Clinical Laboratory Technicians
description: Perform routine medical laboratory tests for the diagnosis, treatment, and prevention of disease. May work under the supervision of a medical technologist.
description_nb: Utfører rutinemessige laboratorietester for å diagnostisere, behandle og forebygge sykdom. Kan jobbe under ledelse av en medisinsk tekniker.

title: Histology Technicians
description: Prepare histological slides from tissue sections for microscopic examination and diagnosis by pathologists. May assist with research studies.

title: Cardiovascular Technologists and Technicians
description: Conduct tests on pulmonary or cardiovascular systems of patients for diagnostic purposes. May conduct or assist in electrocardiograms, cardiac catheterizations, pulmonary functions, lung capacity, and similar tests. Includes vascular technologists.
description_nb: Utfører tester på lunge- eller hjerte-karsystemet hos pasienter med diagnostiske formål. Kan utføre eller bistå ved EKG, hjertekatetisering, test av lungefunksjon, lungekapasitet og liknende. Inkluderer vaskulærteknologer.

title: Diagnostic Medical Sonographers
description: Produce ultrasonic recordings of internal organs for use by physicians.
description_nb: Framstiller ultralydbilder av indre organer som leger kan bruke.

title: Nuclear Medicine Technologists
description: Prepare, administer, and measure radioactive isotopes in therapeutic, diagnostic, and tracer studies using a variety of radioisotope equipment. Prepare stock solutions of radioactive materials and calculate doses to be administered by radiologists. Subject patients to radiation. Execute blood volume, red cell survival, and fat absorption studies following standard laboratory techniques.
description_nb: Klargjør, håndterer og måler radioaktive isotoper i terapeutiske, diagnostiske og sporingsstudier ved å bruke forskjellig radioisotoputstyr. Klargjør stamløsninger av radioaktive stoffer og beregner doser som kan gis av radiologer. Utsetter pasienter for stråling. Utfører studier av blodvolum, rød blodcelletest, og fettopptak ved å bruke standard laboratorieteknikker.

title: Radiologic Technologists and Technicians
description: Take x rays and CAT scans or administer nonradioactive materials into patient's blood stream for diagnostic purposes. Includes technologists who specialize in other scanning modalities.
description_nb: Tar røntgenbilder og CAT-skanninger eller tilfører ikke-radioaktive stoffer til pasientens blodomløp med diagnostiske formål. Inkluderer teknikere som har spesialisert seg på andre skannemetoder.

title: Magnetic Resonance Imaging Technologists
description: Operate Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) scanners. Monitor patient safety and comfort, and view images of area being scanned to ensure quality of pictures. May administer gadolinium contrast dosage intravenously. May interview patient, explain MRI procedures, and position patient on examining table. May enter into the computer data such as patient history, anatomical area to be scanned, orientation specified, and position of entry.
description_nb: Bruker magnetresonanstomografiskannere. Overvåker pasientsikkerhet og -komfort og ser på bilder som blir skannet, for å forsikre at kvaliteten holder. Kan gi intravenøse kontrastdoser med gadolinium. Kan intervjue pasienter, forklare MRI-prosedyrer og posisjonere pasienten på undersøkelsesbordet. Kan taste inn data som pasienthistorie, anatomisk område som skal skannes, spesifisert justering og inngangsposisjon.

title: Medical Dosimetrists
description: Generate radiation treatment plans, develop radiation dose calculations, communicate and supervise the treatment plan implementation, and consult with members of radiation oncology team.

title: Emergency Medical Technicians
description: Assess injuries and illnesses and administer basic emergency medical care. May transport injured or sick persons to medical facilities.

title: Paramedics
description: Administer basic or advanced emergency medical care and assess injuries and illnesses. May administer medication intravenously, use equipment such as EKGs, or administer advanced life support to sick or injured individuals.

title: Dietetic Technicians
description: Assist in the provision of food service and nutritional programs, under the supervision of a dietitian. May plan and produce meals based on established guidelines, teach principles of food and nutrition, or counsel individuals.
description_nb: Bistår i å utarbeide matplaner og kostholdsprogram, under tilsyn av en kostholdsekspert. Kan planlegge og lage måltider basert på fastsatte retningslinjer, lære bort prinsipper for mat og ernæring eller rådgi enkeltpersoner.

title: Pharmacy Technicians
description: Prepare medications under the direction of a pharmacist. May measure, mix, count out, label, and record amounts and dosages of medications according to prescription orders.
description_nb: Klargjør medikamenter under ledelse av en farmasøyt. Kan måle, blande, telle opp, merke og journalføre mengder og doser av medikamenter i tråd med reseptinstrukser.

title: Psychiatric Technicians
description: Care for individuals with mental or emotional conditions or disabilities, following the instructions of physicians or other health practitioners. Monitor patients' physical and emotional well-being and report to medical staff. May participate in rehabilitation and treatment programs, help with personal hygiene, and administer oral or injectable medications.
description_nb: Pleier personer med mentale eller emosjonelle tilstander eller funksjonshemninger, ved å følge instrukser fra leger eller annet helsepersonell. Overvåker pasienters fysiske og emosjonelle helse og rapporterer til medisinsk personale. Kan ta del i rehabiliterings- og behandlingsprogrammer, hjelpe til med personlig hygiene, og administrere orale eller injiserbare medikamenter.

title: Surgical Technologists
description: Assist in operations, under the supervision of surgeons, registered nurses, or other surgical personnel. May help set up operating room, prepare and transport patients for surgery, adjust lights and equipment, pass instruments and other supplies to surgeons and surgeon's assistants, hold retractors, cut sutures, and help count sponges, needles, supplies, and instruments.
description_nb: Er assistent ved operasjoner, under ledelse av kirurger, autoriserte sykepleiere eller annet helsepersonell. Kan hjelpe til med oppsett av operasjonssalen, klargjøre og transportere pasienter til kirurgi, justere lys og utstyr, gi instrumenter og annet materiell til kirurger og assistenter, holde sårhaker, klippe suturtråd og hjelpe til med å telle svamper, nåler, materiell og instrumenter.

title: Veterinary Technologists and Technicians
description: Perform medical tests in a laboratory environment for use in the treatment and diagnosis of diseases in animals. Prepare vaccines and serums for prevention of diseases. Prepare tissue samples, take blood samples, and execute laboratory tests, such as urinalysis and blood counts. Clean and sterilize instruments and materials and maintain equipment and machines. May assist a veterinarian during surgery.
description_nb: Utfører medisinske tester i laboratorium til bruk i behandling og diagnostisering av sykdommer hos dyr. Klargjør vaksiner og serum for å forebygge sykdommer. Klargjør vevsprøver, tar blodprøver og utfører laboratorietester, som urinanalyser og blodtellinger. Rengjør og steriliserer instrumenter og materialer og vedlikeholder utstyr og maskiner. Kan assistere veterinærer ved kirurgi.

title: Ophthalmic Medical Technicians
description: Assist ophthalmologists by performing ophthalmic clinical functions. May administer eye exams, administer eye medications, and instruct the patient in care and use of corrective lenses.
description_nb: Bistår oftalmologer/øyeleger med å utføre oftalmiske kliniske oppgaver. Kan utføre øyeundersøkelser, administrere øyemedisiner og instruere pasienter i vedlikehold og bruk av korrektive linser.

title: Licensed Practical and Licensed Vocational Nurses
description: Care for ill, injured, or convalescing patients or persons with disabilities in hospitals, nursing homes, clinics, private homes, group homes, and similar institutions. May work under the supervision of a registered nurse. Licensing required.
description_nb: Pleier syke og skadde pasienter eller rekonvalesenter eller personer med funksjonshemninger på sykehus, pleiehjem, klinikker, private hjem, gruppehjem eller liknende institusjoner. Kan arbeide under ledelse av en autorisert sykepleier. Autorisasjon er påkrevd.

title: Medical Records Specialists
description: Compile, process, and maintain medical records of hospital and clinic patients in a manner consistent with medical, administrative, ethical, legal, and regulatory requirements of the healthcare system. Classify medical and healthcare concepts, including diagnosis, procedures, medical services, and equipment, into the healthcare industry's numerical coding system. Includes medical coders.

title: Opticians, Dispensing
description: Design, measure, fit, and adapt lenses and frames for client according to written optical prescription or specification. Assist client with inserting, removing, and caring for contact lenses. Assist client with selecting frames. Measure customer for size of eyeglasses and coordinate frames with facial and eye measurements and optical prescription. Prepare work order for optical laboratory containing instructions for grinding and mounting lenses in frames. Verify exactness of finished lens spectacles. Adjust frame and lens position to fit client. May shape or reshape frames. Includes contact lens opticians.
description_nb: Utformer, måler, justerer og tilpasser glass og innfatning for kunder i tråd med spesifikasjoner på brilleseddelen. Hjelper kunder med å sette inn, ta ut og ta vare på kontaktlinser. Hjelper kunder med å velge innfatning. Måler kunden for å finne riktig størrelse på glassene og velger innfatning etter ansikts- og øyemålinger og brilleseddel. Utformer arbeidsordre til optiske laboratorier med instruksjoner for sliping og montering av brilleglass i innfatninger. Verifiserer at brilleglassene er presist utformet. Justerer innfatninger og glass så det passer kunden. Kan forme eller omforme innfatninger Inkluderer kontaktlinseoptikere.

title: Orthotists and Prosthetists
description: Design, measure, fit, and adapt orthopedic braces, appliances or prostheses, such as limbs or facial parts for patients with disabling conditions.
description_nb: Utformer, måler, justerer og tilpasser ortopediske ortoser, hjelpemidler eller proteser, som lemmer eller ansiktsdeler for pasienter med funksjonsnedsettende tilstander.

title: Hearing Aid Specialists
description: Select and fit hearing aids for customers. Administer and interpret tests of hearing. Assess hearing instrument efficacy. Take ear impressions and prepare, design, and modify ear molds.
description_nb: Velger og tilpasser høreapparat for kunder. Utfører og fortolker hørselsundersøkelser. Vurderer effektiviteten til høreapparat. Tar øreavstøpninger og gjør klar, utformer og modifiserer ørestøpeformer.

title: Health Technologists and Technicians, All Other
description: All health technologists and technicians not listed separately.
description_nb: Alle helseteknologer og -teknikere som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Neurodiagnostic Technologists
description: Conduct electroneurodiagnostic (END) tests such as electroencephalograms, evoked potentials, polysomnograms, or electronystagmograms. May perform nerve conduction studies.
description_nb: Utfører END-tester (elektronevrodiagnostiske) som elektroencefalogram, evoked response, polysomnogram eller electronystagmogram. Kan utføre nerveledningsundersøkelse.

title: Ophthalmic Medical Technologists
description: Assist ophthalmologists by performing ophthalmic clinical functions and ophthalmic photography. Provide instruction and supervision to other ophthalmic personnel. Assist with minor surgical procedures, applying aseptic techniques and preparing instruments. May perform eye exams, administer eye medications, and instruct patients in care and use of corrective lenses.
description_nb: Bistår oftalmologer/øyeleger med å utføre oftalmiske kliniske oppgaver og oftalmisk fotografi. Gir instrukser og veiledning til oftalmisk personale. Assisterer ved mindre kirurgiske prosedyrer, anvender aseptiske teknikker og klargjør instrumenter. Kan utføre øyeundersøkelser, administrerer øyemedikamenter og instruerer pasienter i vedlikehold og bruk av korrektive linser.

title: Patient Representatives
description: Assist patients in obtaining services, understanding policies and making health care decisions.

title: Health Information Technologists and Medical Registrars
description: Apply knowledge of healthcare and information systems to assist in the design, development, and continued modification and analysis of computerized healthcare systems. Abstract, collect, and analyze treatment and followup information of patients. May educate staff and assist in problem solving to promote the implementation of the healthcare information system. May design, develop, test, and implement databases with complete history, diagnosis, treatment, and health status to help monitor diseases.

title: Athletic Trainers
description: Evaluate and advise individuals to assist recovery from or avoid athletic-related injuries or illnesses, or maintain peak physical fitness. May provide first aid or emergency care.
description_nb: Vurderer og rådgir enkeltpersoner for å hjelpe med bedring etter eller å unngå idrettsrelaterte skader eller lidelser, eller å opprettholde optimal fysisk form. Kan gi førstehjelp eller nødhjelp.

title: Genetic Counselors
description: Assess individual or family risk for a variety of inherited conditions, such as genetic disorders and birth defects. Provide information to other healthcare providers or to individuals and families concerned with the risk of inherited conditions. Advise individuals and families to support informed decisionmaking and coping methods for those at risk. May help conduct research related to genetic conditions or genetic counseling.
description_nb: Vurderer hvilken risiko enkeltpersoner eller familier har for forskjellige arvelige tilstander, som genetiske sykdommer og fødselsdefekter. Tilbyr informasjon til annet helsepersonell eller til enkeltpersoner og familier som er bekymret for risikoen for arvelige tilstander. Rådgir enkeltpersoner og familier for å bidra til informerte avgjørelser og mestringsstrategier for dem som er i risikogrupper. Kan hjelpe til med forskning i tilknytning til genetiske sykdommer eller genetisk veiledning.

title: Surgical Assistants
description: Assist in operations, under the supervision of surgeons. May, in accordance with state laws, help surgeons to make incisions and close surgical sites, manipulate or remove tissues, implant surgical devices or drains, suction the surgical site, place catheters, clamp or cauterize vessels or tissue, and apply dressings to surgical site.

title: Healthcare Practitioners and Technical Workers, All Other
title_nb: Helsepersonell og teknisk ansatte, alle andre
description: All healthcare practitioners and technical workers not listed separately.
description_nb: Alt helsepersonell og alle teknisk ansatte som ikke er ført opp separat.

title: Midwives
description: Provide prenatal care and childbirth assistance.
description_nb: Gir prenatal pleie og fødselshjelp.

title: Home Health Aides
description: Monitor the health status of an individual with disabilities or illness, and address their health-related needs, such as changing bandages, dressing wounds, or administering medication. Work is performed under the direction of offsite or intermittent onsite licensed nursing staff. Provide assistance with routine healthcare tasks or activities of daily living, such as feeding, bathing, toileting, or ambulation. May also help with tasks such as preparing meals, doing light housekeeping, and doing laundry depending on the patient's abilities.

title: Personal Care Aides
description: Provide personalized assistance to individuals with disabilities or illness who require help with personal care and activities of daily living support (e.g., feeding, bathing, dressing, grooming, toileting, and ambulation). May also provide help with tasks such as preparing meals, doing light housekeeping, and doing laundry. Work is performed in various settings depending on the needs of the care recipient and may include locations such as their home, place of work, out in the community, or at a daytime nonresidential facility.

title: Nursing Assistants
description: Provide or assist with basic care or support under the direction of onsite licensed nursing staff. Perform duties such as monitoring of health status, feeding, bathing, dressing, grooming, toileting, or ambulation of patients in a health or nursing facility. May include medication administration and other health-related tasks. Includes nursing care attendants, nursing aides, and nursing attendants.

title: Orderlies
description: Transport patients to areas such as operating rooms or x-ray rooms using wheelchairs, stretchers, or moveable beds. May maintain stocks of supplies or clean and transport equipment. Psychiatric orderlies are included in Psychiatric Aides.

title: Psychiatric Aides
description: Assist mentally impaired or emotionally disturbed patients, working under direction of nursing and medical staff. May assist with daily living activities, lead patients in educational and recreational activities, or accompany patients to and from examinations and treatments. May restrain violent patients. Includes psychiatric orderlies.

title: Occupational Therapy Assistants
description: Assist occupational therapists in providing occupational therapy treatments and procedures. May, in accordance with State laws, assist in development of treatment plans, carry out routine functions, direct activity programs, and document the progress of treatments. Generally requires formal training.
description_nb: Bistår arbeidsterapeuter i å gi arbeidsterapeutiske behandlinger og prosedyrer. Kan bistå i å utarbeide behandlingsplaner, utføre rutineoppgaver, lede aktivitetsprogrammer og dokumenterer framgang i behandling. Krever som regel formell opplæring.

title: Occupational Therapy Aides
description: Under close supervision of an occupational therapist or occupational therapy assistant, perform only delegated, selected, or routine tasks in specific situations. These duties include preparing patient and treatment room.
description_nb: Utfører kun tildelte, utvalgte eller rutinemessige oppgaver i bestemte situasjoner under tett oppsyn av arbeidsterapeuter eller assistenter. Oppgavene inkluderer å klargjøre pasient- og behandlingsrom.

title: Physical Therapist Assistants
description: Assist physical therapists in providing physical therapy treatments and procedures. May, in accordance with State laws, assist in the development of treatment plans, carry out routine functions, document the progress of treatment, and modify specific treatments in accordance with patient status and within the scope of treatment plans established by a physical therapist. Generally requires formal training.
description_nb: Bistår fysioterapeuter i å gi fysioterapeutiske behandlinger og prosedyrer. Kan bistå i å utarbeide behandlingsplaner, utføre rutineoppgaver, dokumenterer framgangen i behandlingen og tilpasse bestemte behandlinger etter pasientens tilstand og innenfor rammene av behandlingsplanen fysioterapeuten har fastsatt. Krever som regel formell opplæring.

title: Physical Therapist Aides
description: Under close supervision of a physical therapist or physical therapy assistant, perform only delegated, selected, or routine tasks in specific situations. These duties include preparing the patient and the treatment area.
description_nb: Utfører kun tildelte, utvalgte eller rutinemessige oppgaver i bestemte situasjoner under tett oppsyn av fysioterapeuter eller assistenter. Oppgavene inkluderer å klargjøre pasienten og behandlingsområdet.

title: Massage Therapists
